 2317: register_agent3() ->
 2318:     [{doc, "Test registration of agents with the NEW interface functions "
 2319:      "and specifying transport domain"}].
 2320: 
 2321: register_agent3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2322:     Pre  = fun() ->
 2323:                    ManagerNode = start_node(register_agent3),
 2324:                    [ManagerNode]
 2325:            end,
 2326:     Case = fun(State) -> do_register_agent3(State, Config) end,
 2327:     Post = fun([{ManagerPeer, _ManagerNode}]) -> peer:stop(ManagerPeer) end,
 2328:     ?TC_TRY(register_agent3, Pre, Case, Post).
 2329: 
 2330: do_register_agent3([{_ManagerPeer, ManagerNode}], Config) ->
 2331:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2332:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2333: 
 2334:     SCO       = ?config(socket_create_opts, Config),
 2335:     ConfDir   = ?config(manager_conf_dir,   Config),
 2336:     DbDir     = ?config(manager_db_dir,     Config),
 2337:     LocalHost = snmp_test_lib:localhost(), 
 2338: 
 2339: 
 2340:     write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
 2341: 
 2342:     Opts = [{server,     [{verbosity, trace}]},
 2343: 	    {net_if,     [{verbosity, trace}, {options, SCO}]},
 2344: 	    {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 2345: 	    {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
 2346: 
 2347: 
 2348:     ?IPRINT("load snmp application"),
 2349:     ok = load_snmp(ManagerNode),
 2350: 
 2351:     ?IPRINT("set manager env for the snmp application"),
 2352:     ok = set_mgr_env(ManagerNode, Opts),
 2353: 
 2354:     ?IPRINT("starting snmp application (with only manager)"),
 2355:     ok = start_snmp(ManagerNode),
 2356: 
 2357:     ?IPRINT("started"),
 2358: 
 2359:     ?SLEEP(1000),
 2360: 
 2361:     ?IPRINT("manager info: ~p~n", [mgr_info(ManagerNode)]),
 2362: 
 2363:     ?IPRINT("register user(s) user_alfa & user_beta"),
 2364:     ok = mgr_register_user(ManagerNode, user_alfa, snmpm_user_default, []),
 2365:     ok = mgr_register_user(ManagerNode, user_beta, snmpm_user_default, []),
 2366:     ?IPRINT("manager info: ~p~n", [mgr_info(ManagerNode)]),
 2367: 
 2368:     ?IPRINT("register agent(s)"),
 2369:     TargetName1 = "agent2", 
 2370:     ok = mgr_register_agent(ManagerNode, user_alfa, TargetName1,
 2371: 				  [{tdomain,   transportDomainUdpIpv4},
 2372: 				   {address,   LocalHost},
 2373: 				   {port,      5001},
 2374: 				   {engine_id, "agentEngineId-1"}]),
 2375:     TargetName2 = "agent3", 
 2376:     ok = mgr_register_agent(ManagerNode, user_alfa, TargetName2,
 2377: 				  [{tdomain,   transportDomainUdpIpv6},
 2378: 				   {address,   {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}},
 2379: 				   {port,      5002},
 2380: 				   {engine_id, "agentEngineId-2"}]),
 2381:     TargetName3 = "agent4", 
 2382:     {error, {unsupported_domain, _} = Reason4} =
 2383: 	mgr_register_agent(ManagerNode, user_beta, TargetName3,
 2384: 			   [{tdomain,   transportDomainTcpIpv4},
 2385: 			    {address,   LocalHost},
 2386: 			    {port,      5003},
 2387: 			    {engine_id, "agentEngineId-3"}]),
 2388:     ?IPRINT("Expected registration failure: ~p", [Reason4]),
 2389:     TargetName4 = "agent5", 
 2390:     {error, {unknown_domain, _} = Reason5} =
 2391: 	mgr_register_agent(ManagerNode, user_beta, TargetName4,
 2392: 			   [{tdomain,   transportDomainUdpIpv4_bad},
 2393: 			    {address,   LocalHost},
 2394: 			    {port,      5004},
 2395: 			    {engine_id, "agentEngineId-4"}]),
 2396:     ?IPRINT("Expected registration failure: ~p", [Reason5]),
 2397: 
 2398:     ?IPRINT("verify all agent(s): expect 2"),
 2399:     case mgr_which_agents(ManagerNode) of
 2400: 	Agents1 when length(Agents1) =:= 2 ->
 2401: 	    ?IPRINT("all agents: ~p~n", [Agents1]),
 2402: 	    ok;
 2403: 	Agents1 ->
 2404: 	    ?FAIL({agent_registration_failure, Agents1})
 2405:     end,
 2406: 
 2407:     ?IPRINT("verify user_alfa agent(s)"),
 2408:     case mgr_which_agents(ManagerNode, user_alfa) of
 2409: 	Agents2 when length(Agents2) =:= 2 ->
 2410: 	    ?IPRINT("calvin agents: ~p~n", [Agents2]),
 2411: 	    ok;
 2412: 	Agents2 ->
 2413: 	    ?FAIL({agent_registration_failure, Agents2})
 2414:     end,
 2415: 
 2416:     ?IPRINT("verify user_beta agent(s)"),
 2417:     case mgr_which_agents(ManagerNode, user_beta) of
 2418: 	Agents3 when length(Agents3) =:= 0 ->
 2419: 	    ?IPRINT("hobbe agents: ~p~n", [Agents3]),
 2420: 	    ok;
 2421: 	Agents3 ->
 2422: 	    ?FAIL({agent_registration_failure, Agents3})
 2423:     end,
 2424: 
 2425:     ?IPRINT("manager info: ~p~n", [mgr_info(ManagerNode)]),
 2426: 
 2427:     ?IPRINT("unregister user user_alfa"),
 2428:     ok = mgr_unregister_user(ManagerNode, user_alfa),
 2429: 
 2430:     ?IPRINT("verify all agent(s): expect 0"),
 2431:     case mgr_which_agents(ManagerNode) of
 2432: 	Agents4 when length(Agents4) =:= 0 ->
 2433: 	    ?IPRINT("all agents: ~p~n", [Agents4]),
 2434: 	    ok;
 2435: 	Agents4 ->
 2436: 	    ?FAIL({agent_unregistration_failure, Agents4})
 2437:     end,
 2438:     ?IPRINT("manager info: ~p~n", [mgr_info(ManagerNode)]),
 2439: 
 2440:     ?IPRINT("verify all agent(s): expect 0"),
 2441:     case mgr_which_agents(ManagerNode) of
 2442: 	[] ->
 2443: 	    ok;
 2444: 	Agents5 ->
 2445: 	    ?EPRINT("all agents: ~p~n", [Agents5]),
 2446: 	    ?FAIL({agent_unregistration_failure, Agents5})
 2447:     end,
 2448: 
 2449:     ?IPRINT("manager info: ~p~n", [mgr_info(ManagerNode)]),
 2450: 
 2451:     ?IPRINT("unregister user user_beta"),
 2452:     ok = mgr_unregister_user(ManagerNode, user_beta),
 2453: 
 2454:     ?IPRINT("manager info: ~p~n", [mgr_info(ManagerNode)]),
 2455: 
 2456:     ?SLEEP(1000),
 2457: 
 2458:     ?IPRINT("stop snmp application (with only manager)"),
 2459:     ok = stop_snmp(ManagerNode),
 2460: 
 2461:     ?SLEEP(1000),
 2462: 
 2463:     ok.

 2467: 
 2468: simple_sync_get3() ->
 2469:     [{doc, "Simple sync get-request - Version 3 API (TargetName and send-opts)"}].
 2470: 
 2471: simple_sync_get3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2472:     ?TC_TRY(simple_sync_get3,
 2473:             fun() -> do_simple_sync_get3(Config) end).
 2474: 
 2475: do_simple_sync_get3(Config) ->
 2476:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2477:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2478:     Self  = self(), 
 2479:     Msg   = simple_sync_get3, 
 2480:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 2481:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 2482:     SendOpts = 
 2483: 	[
 2484: 	 {extra, Extra}
 2485: 	], 
 2486:     Get = fun(Node, TargetName, Oids) -> 
 2487: 		  mgr_user_sync_get2(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) 
 2488: 	  end,
 2489:     PostVerify = 
 2490: 	fun() ->
 2491: 		receive
 2492: 		    Msg ->
 2493: 			ok
 2494: 		end
 2495: 	end,
 2496:     Res = do_simple_sync_get3(Config, Get, PostVerify),
 2497:     display_log(Config),
 2498:     Res.
 2499: 
 2500: 
 2501: do_simple_sync_get3(Config, Get, PostVerify) ->
 2502:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2503:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2504: 
 2505:     Node       = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 2506:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 2507: 
 2508:     ?IPRINT("issue get-request without loading the mib"),
 2509:     Oids1 = [?sysObjectID_instance, ?sysDescr_instance, ?sysUpTime_instance],
 2510:     ok = do_simple_sync_get3(Node, TargetName, Oids1, Get, PostVerify),
 2511: 
 2512:     ?IPRINT("issue get-request after first loading the mibs"),
 2513:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(Node, std_mib()),
 2514:     Oids2 = [[sysObjectID, 0], [sysDescr, 0], [sysUpTime, 0]],
 2515:     ok = do_simple_sync_get3(Node, TargetName, Oids2, Get, PostVerify),
 2516:     ok.
 2517: 
 2518: do_simple_sync_get3(Node, TargetName, Oids, Get, PostVerify) 
 2519:   when is_function(Get, 3) andalso is_function(PostVerify, 0) ->
 2520: 
 2521:     ?IPRINT("try get for ~p (on ~p):"
 2522:             "~n      Oids: ~p", [TargetName, Node, Oids]),
 2523:     Reply =
 2524:         case Get(Node, TargetName, Oids) of
 2525:             {ok, R, _Rem} ->
 2526:                 ?IPRINT("get reply: "
 2527:                         "~n       Reply: ~p"
 2528:                         "~n       Rem:   ~w", [R, _Rem]),
 2529: 
 2530:                 R;
 2531:             {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
 2532:                 ?EPRINT("get failed: "
 2533:                         "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2534:                 ERROR
 2535:         end,
 2536: 
 2537:     %% verify that the operation actually worked:
 2538:     %% The order should be the same, so no need to search
 2539:     ok = case Reply of
 2540: 		   {noError, 0, [#varbind{oid   = ?sysObjectID_instance,
 2541: 					  value = SysObjectID}, 
 2542: 				 #varbind{oid   = ?sysDescr_instance,
 2543: 					  value = SysDescr},
 2544: 				 #varbind{oid   = ?sysUpTime_instance,
 2545: 					  value = SysUpTime}]} ->
 2546: 		       ?IPRINT("expected result from get: "
 2547:                                "~n   SysObjectID: ~p"
 2548:                                "~n   SysDescr:    ~s"
 2549:                                "~n   SysUpTime:   ~w", 
 2550:                                [SysObjectID, SysDescr, SysUpTime]),
 2551: 		       PostVerify();
 2552: 		   {noError, 0, Vbs} ->
 2553: 		       ?EPRINT("unexpected varbinds: "
 2554:                                "~n      ~p", [Vbs]),
 2555: 		       {error, {unexpected_vbs, Vbs}};
 2556: 		   Else ->
 2557: 		       ?EPRINT("unexpected reply: "
 2558:                                "~n      ~p", [Else]),
 2559: 		       {error, {unexpected_response, Else}}
 2560: 	       end,
 2561:     ok.
 2562: 
 2563: 
 2564: %%======================================================================
 2565: 
 2566: sag_verify({noError, 0, _Vbs}, any) ->
 2567:     ?IPRINT("verified [any]"),
 2568:     ok;
 2569: sag_verify({noError, 0, Vbs}, Exp) ->
 2570:     ?DBG("verified first stage ok: "
 2571: 	 "~n   Vbs: ~p"
 2572: 	 "~n   Exp: ~p", [Vbs, Exp]),
 2573:     sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 2574: sag_verify(Error, _) ->
 2575:     {error, {unexpected_response, Error}}.
 2576: 
 2577: sag_verify_vbs([], []) ->
 2578:     ?DBG("verified second stage ok", []),
 2579:     ok;
 2580: sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, []) ->
 2581:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, Vbs}};
 2582: sag_verify_vbs([], Exp) ->
 2583:     {error, {expected_vbs, Exp}};
 2584: sag_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid}|Vbs], [any|Exp]) ->
 2585:     ?IPRINT("verified [any] oid ~w", [Oid]),
 2586:     sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 2587: sag_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|Vbs], [Oid|Exp]) ->
 2588:     ?IPRINT("verified oid ~w [~p]", [Oid, Value]),
 2589:     sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 2590: sag_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|Vbs], [{Oid,Value}|Exp]) ->
 2591:     ?IPRINT("verified oid ~w and ~p", [Oid, Value]),
 2592:     sag_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 2593: sag_verify_vbs([Vb|_], [E|_]) ->
 2594:     {error, {unexpected_vb, Vb, E}}.
 2595: 
 2596: 
 2597: %%======================================================================
 2598: 
 2599: simple_async_get3() ->
 2600:     [{doc, "Simple (async) get-request - Version 3 API (TargetName and send-opts)"}].
 2601: 
 2602: simple_async_get3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2603:     ?TC_TRY(simple_async_get3,
 2604:             fun() -> do_simple_async_get3(Config) end).
 2605: 
 2606: do_simple_async_get3(Config) ->
 2607:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2608:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2609:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 2610:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 2611:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 2612:     Self  = self(), 
 2613:     Msg   = simple_async_get3, 
 2614:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 2615:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 2616:     SendOpts = 
 2617: 	[
 2618: 	 {extra, Extra}
 2619: 	], 
 2620:     Get = fun(Oids) -> async_g_exec3(MgrNode, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) end,
 2621:     PostVerify = fun(ok)    -> receive Msg -> ok end;
 2622: 		    (Error) -> Error 
 2623: 		 end,
 2624:     Res = do_simple_async_sync_get3(Config, MgrNode, AgentNode,
 2625:                                     Get, PostVerify),
 2626:     display_log(Config),
 2627:     Res.
 2628: 
 2629: do_simple_async_sync_get3(Config, MgrNode, AgentNode, Get, PostVerify) ->
 2630:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 2631:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 2632:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 2633:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 2634:     do_simple_async_sync_get3(fun() -> mgr_info(MgrNode) end,
 2635: 			      fun() -> agent_info(AgentNode) end,
 2636: 			      Get, PostVerify).
 2637: 
 2638: do_simple_async_sync_get3(MgrInfo, AgentInfo, Get, PostVerify) 
 2639:   when is_function(MgrInfo, 0) andalso 
 2640:        is_function(AgentInfo, 0) andalso 
 2641:        is_function(Get, 1) andalso 
 2642:        is_function(PostVerify, 1) ->
 2643:     Requests = 
 2644: 	[
 2645: 	 { 1,  
 2646: 	   [?sysObjectID_instance], 
 2647: 	   Get, 
 2648: 	   fun(X) -> 
 2649: 		   PostVerify(sag_verify(X, [?sysObjectID_instance])) end}, 
 2650: 	 { 2,  
 2651: 	   [?sysDescr_instance, ?sysUpTime_instance],
 2652: 	   Get, 
 2653: 	   fun(X) -> 
 2654: 		   PostVerify(sag_verify(X, [?sysObjectID_instance, 
 2655: 					     ?sysUpTime_instance]))
 2656: 	   end}, 
 2657: 	 { 3,  
 2658: 	   [[sysObjectID, 0], [sysDescr, 0], [sysUpTime, 0]],
 2659: 	   Get, 
 2660: 	   fun(X) -> 
 2661: 		   PostVerify(sag_verify(X, [?sysObjectID_instance, 
 2662: 					     ?sysDescr_instance, 
 2663: 					     ?sysUpTime_instance]))
 2664: 		       
 2665: 	   end}, 
 2666: 	 { 4,  
 2667: 	   [?sysObjectID_instance, 
 2668: 	    ?sysDescr_instance, 
 2669: 	    ?sysUpTime_instance],
 2670: 	   Get, 
 2671: 	   fun(X) -> 
 2672: 		   PostVerify(sag_verify(X, [?sysObjectID_instance, 
 2673: 					     ?sysDescr_instance, 
 2674: 					     ?sysUpTime_instance]))
 2675: 	   end}
 2676: 	],
 2677:     
 2678:     ?IPRINT("manager info when starting test: "
 2679:             "~n      ~p", [MgrInfo()]),
 2680:     ?IPRINT("agent info when starting test: "
 2681:             "~n      ~p",   [AgentInfo()]),
 2682: 
 2683:     ok = async_exec(Requests, []),
 2684: 
 2685:     ?IPRINT("manager info when ending test: "
 2686:             "~n      ~p", [MgrInfo()]),
 2687:     ?IPRINT("agent info when ending test: "
 2688:             "~n      ~p",   [AgentInfo()]),
 2689: 
 2690:     ok.
 2691: 
 2692: async_g_exec3(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) ->
 2693:     mgr_user_async_get2(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts).
 2694: 
 2695: 
 2696: %%======================================================================
 2697: 
 2698: verify_ssgn_reply1({noError, 0, _Vbs}, any) ->
 2699:     ok;
 2700: verify_ssgn_reply1({noError, 0, Vbs}, Expected) ->
 2701:     check_ssgn_vbs(Vbs, Expected);
 2702: verify_ssgn_reply1(R, _) ->
 2703:     {error, {unexpected_reply, R}}.
 2704: 
 2705: verify_ssgn_reply2({ErrStatus, ErrIdx, _Vbs}, {ErrStatus, ErrIdx, any}) ->
 2706:     ok;
 2707: verify_ssgn_reply2({ErrStatus, ErrIdx, Vbs}, {ErrStatus, ErrIdx, Expected}) ->
 2708:     check_ssgn_vbs(Vbs, Expected);
 2709: verify_ssgn_reply2(R, _) ->
 2710:     {error, {unexpected_reply, R}}.
 2711: 
 2712: check_ssgn_vbs([], []) ->
 2713:     ok;
 2714: check_ssgn_vbs(Unexpected, []) ->
 2715:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, Unexpected}};
 2716: check_ssgn_vbs([], Expected) ->
 2717:     {error, {expected_vbs, Expected}};
 2718: check_ssgn_vbs([#varbind{value = endOfMibView}|R], 
 2719: 	       [endOfMibView|Expected]) ->
 2720:     check_ssgn_vbs(R, Expected);
 2721: check_ssgn_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid}|R], [Oid|Expected]) ->
 2722:     check_ssgn_vbs(R, Expected);
 2723: check_ssgn_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|R], 
 2724: 	       [{Oid, Value}|Expected]) ->
 2725:     check_ssgn_vbs(R, Expected);
 2726: check_ssgn_vbs([Vb|_], [E|_]) ->
 2727:     {error, {unexpected_vb, Vb, E}}.
 2728: 
 2729: 
 2730: %%======================================================================
 2731: 
 2732: simple_sync_get_next3() ->
 2733:     [{doc, "Simple (sync) get_next-request - "
 2734:      "Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 2735: 
 2736: simple_sync_get_next3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2737:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2738:     put(tname, ssgn3),
 2739:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2740:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2741:     Self  = self(), 
 2742:     Msg   = simple_sync_get_next3, 
 2743:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 2744:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 2745:     SendOpts = 
 2746: 	[
 2747: 	 {extra, Extra}
 2748: 	], 
 2749:     GetNext = fun(Node, TargetName, Oids) -> 
 2750: 		      mgr_user_sync_get_next2(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) 
 2751: 	      end,
 2752:     PostVerify = fun(ok)    -> receive Msg -> ok end;
 2753: 		    (Error) -> Error 
 2754: 		 end,
 2755:     do_simple_sync_get_next3(Config, GetNext, PostVerify),
 2756:     display_log(Config),
 2757:     ok.
 2758: 
 2759: 
 2760: do_simple_sync_get_next3(Config, GetNext, PostVerify) 
 2761:   when is_function(GetNext, 3) andalso is_function(PostVerify, 1) ->
 2762: 
 2763:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 2764:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 2765:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 2766: 
 2767:     %% -- 1 --
 2768:     Oids01 = [[1,3,7,1]],
 2769:     VF01   = fun(X) -> verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{[1,3,7,1],endOfMibView}]) end,
 2770:     ok = do_simple_get_next(1,
 2771: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids01, VF01, 
 2772: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2773:     
 2774:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 2775: 
 2776:     %% -- 2 --
 2777:     Oids02 = [[sysDescr], [1,3,7,1]], 
 2778:     VF02   = fun(X) -> 
 2779: 		     verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [?sysDescr_instance, endOfMibView]) 
 2780: 	     end,
 2781:     ok = do_simple_get_next(2,
 2782: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids02, VF02, 
 2783: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2784:     
 2785:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 2786:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 2787:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 2788: 
 2789:     %% -- 3 --
 2790:     {ok, [TCnt2|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tCnt2),
 2791:     Oids03 = [[TCnt2, 1]], 
 2792:     VF03   = fun(X) -> 
 2793: 		     verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{fl([TCnt2,2]), 100}]) 
 2794: 	     end,
 2795:     ok = do_simple_get_next(3,
 2796: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids03, VF03, 
 2797: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2798:     
 2799:     %% -- 4 --
 2800:     Oids04 = [[TCnt2, 2]], 
 2801:     VF04   = fun(X) -> 
 2802: 		     verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{fl([TCnt2,2]), endOfMibView}]) 
 2803: 	     end,
 2804:     ok = do_simple_get_next(4,
 2805: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids04, VF04, 
 2806: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2807:     
 2808:     %% -- 5 --
 2809:     {ok, [TGenErr1|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tGenErr1),
 2810:     Oids05 = [TGenErr1], 
 2811:     VF05   = fun(X) -> 
 2812: 		     verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 1, [TGenErr1]}) 
 2813: 	     end,
 2814:     ok = do_simple_get_next(5,
 2815: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids05, VF05, 
 2816: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2817:     
 2818:     %% -- 6 --
 2819:     {ok, [TGenErr2|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tGenErr2),
 2820:     Oids06 = [TGenErr2], 
 2821:     VF06   = fun(X) -> 
 2822: 		     verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 1, [TGenErr2]}) 
 2823: 	     end,
 2824:     ok = do_simple_get_next(6,
 2825: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids06, VF06, 
 2826: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2827:     
 2828:     %% -- 7 --
 2829:     {ok, [TGenErr3|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tGenErr3),
 2830:     Oids07 = [[sysDescr], TGenErr3], 
 2831:     VF07   = fun(X) -> 
 2832: 		     verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 2, 
 2833: 					   [?sysDescr, TGenErr3]}) 
 2834: 	     end,
 2835:     ok = do_simple_get_next(7,
 2836: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids07, VF07, 
 2837: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2838:     
 2839:     %% -- 8 --
 2840:     {ok, [TTooBig|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tTooBig),
 2841:     Oids08 = [TTooBig], 
 2842:     VF08   = fun(X) -> 
 2843: 		     verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {tooBig, 0, []}) 
 2844: 	     end,
 2845:     ok = do_simple_get_next(8,
 2846: 				  MgrNode, TargetName, Oids08, VF08, 
 2847: 				  GetNext, PostVerify),
 2848:     ok.
 2849: 
 2850: do_simple_get_next(N, Node, TargetName, Oids, Verify, GetNext, PostVerify) ->
 2851:     ?IPRINT("issue get-next command ~w", [N]),
 2852:     case GetNext(Node, TargetName, Oids) of
 2853: 	{ok, Reply, _Rem} ->
 2854: 	    ?DBG("get-next ok:"
 2855: 		 "~n   Reply: ~p"
 2856: 		 "~n   Rem:   ~w", [Reply, _Rem]),
 2857: 	    PostVerify(Verify(Reply));
 2858: 
 2859: 	Error ->
 2860: 	    {error, {unexpected_reply, Error}}
 2861:     end.
 2862: 
 2863: 
 2864:

 2867: simple_async_get_next3_cbp_def() ->
 2868:     [{doc, "Simple (async) get_next-request - "
 2869:      "Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 2870: 
 2871: simple_async_get_next3_cbp_def(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2872:     simple_async_get_next3(ssgn2_cbp_def, Config).
 2873: 
 2874: simple_async_get_next3_cbp_temp() ->
 2875:     [{doc, "Simple (async) get_next-request - "
 2876:      "Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 2877: 
 2878: simple_async_get_next3_cbp_temp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2879:     simple_async_get_next3(ssgn2_cbp_temp, Config).
 2880: 
 2881: simple_async_get_next3_cbp_perm() ->
 2882:     [{doc, "Simple (async) get_next-request - "
 2883:      "Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 2884: 
 2885: simple_async_get_next3_cbp_perm(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2886:     simple_async_get_next3(ssgn2_cbp_perm, Config).
 2887: 
 2888: simple_async_get_next3(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2889:     ?TC_TRY(Case,
 2890:             fun() -> do_simple_async_get_next3(Config) end).
 2891: 
 2892: do_simple_async_get_next3(Config) ->
 2893:     %% process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2894:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 2895:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 2896: 
 2897:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 2898:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 2899:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 2900: 
 2901:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 2902:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 2903:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 2904:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 2905: 
 2906:     Self  = self(), 
 2907:     Msg   = simple_async_get_next3, 
 2908:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 2909:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 2910:     SendOpts = 
 2911: 	[
 2912: 	 {extra, Extra}
 2913: 	], 
 2914: 
 2915:     GetNext = fun(Oids) ->
 2916: 		      async_gn_exec3(MgrNode, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts)
 2917: 	      end,
 2918:     PostVerify = fun(ok)    -> receive Msg -> ok end;
 2919: 		    (Error) -> Error 
 2920: 		 end,
 2921: 
 2922:     Res = do_simple_async_get_next3(MgrNode, AgentNode, GetNext, PostVerify),
 2923:     display_log(Config),
 2924:     Res.
 2925: 
 2926: do_simple_async_get_next3(MgrNode, AgentNode, GetNext, PostVerify) 
 2927:   when is_function(GetNext, 1) andalso is_function(PostVerify, 1) ->
 2928:     {ok, [TCnt2|_]}    = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tCnt2),
 2929:     {ok, [TGenErr1|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tGenErr1),
 2930:     {ok, [TGenErr2|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tGenErr2),
 2931:     {ok, [TGenErr3|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tGenErr3),
 2932:     {ok, [TTooBig|_]}  = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tTooBig),
 2933: 
 2934:     Requests = 
 2935: 	[
 2936: 	 {1, 
 2937: 	  [[1,3,7,1]], 
 2938: 	  GetNext, 
 2939: 	  fun(X) ->
 2940: 		  PostVerify(
 2941: 		    verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{[1,3,7,1], endOfMibView}])) 
 2942: 		  
 2943: 	  end}, 
 2944: 	 {2, 
 2945: 	  [[sysDescr], [1,3,7,1]], 
 2946: 	  GetNext, 
 2947: 	  fun(X) ->
 2948: 		  PostVerify(
 2949: 		    verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [?sysDescr_instance, endOfMibView]))
 2950: 	  end}, 
 2951: 	 {3, 
 2952: 	  [[TCnt2, 1]], 
 2953: 	  GetNext, 
 2954: 	  fun(X) ->
 2955: 		  PostVerify(
 2956: 		    verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{fl([TCnt2,2]), 100}]))
 2957: 	  end}, 
 2958: 	 {4, 
 2959: 	  [[TCnt2, 2]], 
 2960: 	  GetNext, 
 2961: 	  fun(X) ->
 2962: 		  PostVerify(
 2963: 		    verify_ssgn_reply1(X, [{fl([TCnt2,2]), endOfMibView}]))
 2964: 	  end}, 
 2965: 	 {5, 
 2966: 	  [TGenErr1], 
 2967: 	  GetNext, 
 2968: 	  fun(X) ->
 2969: 		  PostVerify(
 2970: 		    verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 1, [TGenErr1]}))
 2971: 	  end}, 
 2972: 	 {6, 
 2973: 	  [TGenErr2], 
 2974: 	  GetNext, 
 2975: 	  fun(X) ->
 2976: 		  PostVerify(
 2977: 		    verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 1, [TGenErr2]}))
 2978: 	  end}, 
 2979: 	 {7, 
 2980: 	  [[sysDescr], TGenErr3], 
 2981: 	  GetNext, 
 2982: 	  fun(X) ->
 2983: 		  PostVerify(
 2984: 		    verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {genErr, 2, [TGenErr3]}))
 2985: 	  end}, 
 2986: 	 {8, 
 2987: 	  [TTooBig], 
 2988: 	  GetNext, 
 2989: 	  fun(X) ->
 2990: 		  PostVerify(
 2991: 		    verify_ssgn_reply2(X, {tooBig, 0, []}))
 2992: 	  end}
 2993: 	],
 2994: 
 2995:     ?IPRINT("manager info when starting test: "
 2996:             "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 2997:     ?IPRINT("agent info when starting test: "
 2998:             "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),
 2999: 
 3000:     ok = async_exec(Requests, []),
 3001: 
 3002:     ?IPRINT("manager info when ending test: "
 3003:             "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 3004:     ?IPRINT("agent info when ending test: "
 3005:             "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),
 3006: 
 3007:     ok.
 3008: 
 3009: 
 3010: async_gn_exec3(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts) ->
 3011:     mgr_user_async_get_next2(Node, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts).

 3015: 
 3016: value_of_vavs(VAVs) ->
 3017:     value_of_vavs(VAVs, []).
 3018: 
 3019: value_of_vavs([], Acc) ->
 3020:     lists:reverse(Acc);
 3021: value_of_vavs([{_Oid, _Type, Val}|VAVs], Acc) ->
 3022:     value_of_vavs(VAVs, [Val|Acc]);
 3023: value_of_vavs([{_Oid, Val}|VAVs], Acc) ->
 3024:     value_of_vavs(VAVs, [Val|Acc]).
 3025: 
 3026: 			       
 3027: %%======================================================================
 3028: 
 3029: simple_sync_set3() ->
 3030:     [{doc, "Simple (sync) set-request - Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 3031: 
 3032: simple_sync_set3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3033:     ?TC_TRY(simple_sync_set3,
 3034:             fun() -> do_simple_sync_set3(Config) end).
 3035: 
 3036: do_simple_sync_set3(Config) ->
 3037:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3038:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 3039: 
 3040:     Self  = self(), 
 3041:     Msg   = simple_sync_set3, 
 3042:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 3043:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 3044:     SendOpts = 
 3045: 	[
 3046: 	 {extra, Extra}
 3047: 	], 
 3048:     
 3049:     Set = fun(Node, TargetName, VAVs) -> 
 3050: 		  mgr_user_sync_set2(Node, TargetName, VAVs, SendOpts) 
 3051: 	  end,
 3052:     PostVerify = fun() -> receive Msg -> ok end end,
 3053: 
 3054:     Res = do_simple_sync_set3(Config, Set, PostVerify),
 3055:     display_log(Config),
 3056:     Res.
 3057: 
 3058: do_simple_sync_set3(Config, Set, PostVerify) 
 3059:   when is_function(Set, 3) andalso is_function(PostVerify, 0) ->
 3060: 
 3061:     Node       = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3062:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 3063: 
 3064:     ?IPRINT("issue set-request without loading the mib"),
 3065:     Val11 = "Arne Anka",
 3066:     Val12 = "Stockholm",
 3067:     VAVs1 = [
 3068: 	     {?sysName_instance,     s, Val11},
 3069: 	     {?sysLocation_instance, s, Val12}
 3070: 	    ],
 3071:     ok = do_simple_set3(Node, TargetName, VAVs1, Set, PostVerify),
 3072: 
 3073:     ?IPRINT("issue set-request after first loading the mibs"),
 3074:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(Node, std_mib()),
 3075:     Val21 = "Sune Anka",
 3076:     Val22 = "Gothenburg",
 3077:     VAVs2 = [
 3078: 	     {[sysName, 0],     Val21},
 3079: 	     {[sysLocation, 0], Val22}
 3080: 	    ],
 3081:     ok = do_simple_set3(Node, TargetName, VAVs2, Set, PostVerify),
 3082:     ok.
 3083: 
 3084: do_simple_set3(Node, TargetName, VAVs, Set, PostVerify) ->
 3085:     [SysName, SysLoc] = value_of_vavs(VAVs),
 3086:     {ok, Reply, _Rem} = Set(Node, TargetName, VAVs),
 3087: 
 3088:     ?DBG("~n   Reply: ~p"
 3089: 	 "~n   Rem:   ~w", [Reply, _Rem]),
 3090: 
 3091:     %% verify that the operation actually worked:
 3092:     %% The order should be the same, so no need to search
 3093:     %% The value we get should be exactly the same as we sent
 3094:     ok = case Reply of
 3095: 		   {noError, 0, [#varbind{oid   = ?sysName_instance,
 3096: 					  value = SysName},
 3097: 				 #varbind{oid   = ?sysLocation_instance,
 3098: 					  value = SysLoc}]} ->
 3099: 		       PostVerify();
 3100: 		   {noError, 0, Vbs} ->
 3101: 		       {error, {unexpected_vbs, Vbs}};
 3102: 		   Else ->
 3103: 		       ?EPRINT("unexpected reply: "
 3104:                                "~n      ~p", [Else]),
 3105: 		       {error, {unexpected_response, Else}}
 3106: 	       end,
 3107:     ok.
 3108: 
 3109: 
 3110: %%======================================================================
 3111: 
 3112: sas_verify({noError, 0, _Vbs}, any) ->
 3113:     ?IPRINT("verified [any]"),
 3114:     ok;
 3115: sas_verify({noError, 0, Vbs}, Expected) ->
 3116:     ?DBG("verified stage 1: "
 3117: 	 "~n   Vbs: ~p"
 3118: 	 "~n   Exp: ~p", [Vbs, Expected]),
 3119:     sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, Expected);
 3120: sas_verify(Error, _) ->
 3121:     {error, {unexpected_reply, Error}}.
 3122: 
 3123: sas_verify_vbs([], []) ->
 3124:     ok;
 3125: sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, []) ->
 3126:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, Vbs}};
 3127: sas_verify_vbs([], Exp) ->
 3128:     {error, {expected_vbs, Exp}};
 3129: sas_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid}|Vbs], [any|Exp]) ->
 3130:     ?IPRINT("verified [any] oid ~w", [Oid]),
 3131:     sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 3132: sas_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|Vbs], [Oid|Exp]) ->
 3133:     ?IPRINT("verified oid ~w [~p]", [Oid, Value]),
 3134:     sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 3135: sas_verify_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|Vbs], [{Oid,Value}|Exp]) ->
 3136:     ?IPRINT("verified oid ~w and ~p", [Oid, Value]),
 3137:     sas_verify_vbs(Vbs, Exp);
 3138: sas_verify_vbs([Vb|_], [E|_]) ->
 3139:     {error, {unexpected_vb, Vb, E}}.
 3140: 
 3141:

 3145:     [{doc, "Simple (async) set-request - Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].

 3147: simple_async_set3_cbp_def(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3148:     simple_async_set3(sas3_cbp_def, Config).
 3149: 
 3150: simple_async_set3_cbp_temp() ->
 3151:     [{doc, "Simple (async) set-request - Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 3152: 
 3153: simple_async_set3_cbp_temp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3154:     simple_async_set3(sas3_cbp_temp, Config).
 3155: 
 3156: simple_async_set3_cbp_perm() ->
 3157:     [{doc, "Simple (async) set-request - Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 3158: 
 3159: simple_async_set3_cbp_perm(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3160:     simple_async_set3(sas3_cbp_perm, Config).
 3161: 
 3162: simple_async_set3(Case, Config) ->
 3163:     ?TC_TRY(Case,
 3164:             fun() -> do_simple_async_set3(Config) end).
 3165: 
 3166: do_simple_async_set3(Config) ->
 3167:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3168:             "~n      ~p~n", [Config]),
 3169: 
 3170:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3171:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 3172:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 3173: 
 3174:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 3175:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 3176:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 3177:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 3178: 
 3179:     Self  = self(), 
 3180:     Msg   = simple_async_set3, 
 3181:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 3182:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 3183:     SendOpts = 
 3184: 	[
 3185: 	 {extra, Extra}
 3186: 	], 
 3187: 
 3188:     Set = 
 3189: 	fun(Oids) ->
 3190: 		async_s_exec3(MgrNode, TargetName, Oids, SendOpts)
 3191: 	end,
 3192:     PostVerify = fun(ok)  -> receive Msg -> ok end; 
 3193: 		    (Res) -> Res 
 3194: 		 end,
 3195: 
 3196:     Res = do_simple_async_set3(MgrNode, AgentNode, Set, PostVerify),
 3197:     display_log(Config),
 3198:     Res.
 3199: 
 3200: do_simple_async_set3(MgrNode, AgentNode, Set, PostVerify) ->
 3201:     Requests = 
 3202: 	[
 3203: 	 {1,
 3204: 	  [{?sysName_instance, s, "Arne Anka"}],
 3205: 	  Set,
 3206: 	  fun(X) ->
 3207: 		  PostVerify(sas_verify(X, [?sysName_instance]))
 3208: 	  end},
 3209: 	 {2,
 3210: 	  [{?sysLocation_instance, s, "Stockholm"}, 
 3211: 	   {?sysName_instance,     s, "Arne Anka"}],
 3212: 	  Set,
 3213: 	  fun(X) ->
 3214: 		  PostVerify(sas_verify(X, 
 3215: 					[?sysLocation_instance, 
 3216: 					 ?sysName_instance]))
 3217: 	  end},
 3218: 	 {3,
 3219: 	  [{[sysName, 0],     "Gothenburg"}, 
 3220: 	   {[sysLocation, 0], "Sune Anka"}],
 3221: 	  Set,
 3222: 	  fun(X) ->
 3223: 		  PostVerify(sas_verify(X, 
 3224: 					[?sysName_instance, 
 3225: 					 ?sysLocation_instance]))
 3226: 	  end}
 3227: 	],
 3228: 
 3229:     ?IPRINT("manager info when starting test: "
 3230:             "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 3231:     ?IPRINT("agent info when starting test: "
 3232:             "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),
 3233: 
 3234:     ok = async_exec(Requests, []),
 3235: 
 3236:     ?IPRINT("manager info when ending test: "
 3237:             "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 3238:     ?IPRINT("agent info when ending test: "
 3239:             "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),
 3240: 
 3241:     ok.
 3242: 
 3243: 
 3244: async_s_exec3(Node, TargetName, VAVs, SendOpts) ->
 3245:     mgr_user_async_set2(Node, TargetName, VAVs, SendOpts).
 3246:

 3249: 
 3250: fl(L) ->
 3251:     lists:flatten(L).
 3252: 
 3253: verify_ssgb_reply1({noError, 0, []}) ->
 3254:     ok;
 3255: verify_ssgb_reply1(X) ->
 3256:     {error, {unexpected_reply, X}}.
 3257: 
 3258: verify_ssgb_reply2({noError, 0, Vbs}, ExpectedVbs) ->
 3259:     check_ssgb_vbs(Vbs, ExpectedVbs);
 3260: verify_ssgb_reply2(Error, _) ->
 3261:     {error, {unexpected_reply, Error}}.
 3262: 
 3263: verify_ssgb_reply3({genErr, 3, Vbs}, ExpectedVbs) ->
 3264:     check_ssgb_vbs(Vbs, ExpectedVbs);
 3265: verify_ssgb_reply3(Unexpected, _) ->
 3266:     {error, {unexpected_reply, Unexpected}}.
 3267: 
 3268: check_ssgb_vbs([], []) ->
 3269:     ok;
 3270: check_ssgb_vbs(Unexpected, []) ->
 3271:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, Unexpected}};
 3272: check_ssgb_vbs([], Expected) ->
 3273:     {error, {expected_vbs, Expected}};
 3274: check_ssgb_vbs([#varbind{value = endOfMibView}|R], 
 3275: 	       [endOfMibView|Expected]) ->
 3276:     check_ssgb_vbs(R, Expected);
 3277: check_ssgb_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid}|R], [Oid|Expected]) ->
 3278:     check_ssgb_vbs(R, Expected);
 3279: check_ssgb_vbs([#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Value}|R], 
 3280: 	       [{Oid, Value}|Expected]) ->
 3281:     check_ssgb_vbs(R, Expected);
 3282: check_ssgb_vbs([R|_], [E|_]) ->
 3283:     {error, {unexpected_vb, R, E}}.
 3284: 
 3285: %%======================================================================
 3286: 
 3287: simple_sync_get_bulk3() ->
 3288:     [{doc, "Simple (sync) get_bulk-request - "
 3289:      "Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 3290: 
 3291: simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3292:     ?TC_TRY(simple_sync_get_bulk3,
 3293:             fun() -> do_simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config) end).
 3294: 
 3295: do_simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config) ->
 3296:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3297:             "~n      ~p~n", [Config]),
 3298: 
 3299:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3300:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 3301:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 3302: 
 3303:     Self  = self(), 
 3304:     Msg   = simple_async_set3, 
 3305:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 3306:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 3307:     SendOpts = 
 3308: 	[
 3309: 	 {extra, Extra}
 3310: 	], 
 3311: 
 3312:     GetBulk = 
 3313: 	fun(NonRep, MaxRep, Oids) ->
 3314: 		mgr_user_sync_get_bulk2(MgrNode, TargetName, 
 3315: 					NonRep, MaxRep, Oids, SendOpts)    
 3316: 	end,
 3317:     PostVerify = fun(ok) -> receive Msg -> ok end;
 3318: 		    (Res) -> Res 
 3319: 		 end,
 3320: 
 3321:     Res = do_simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config, MgrNode, AgentNode, GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3322:     display_log(Config),
 3323:     Res.
 3324: 
 3325: do_simple_sync_get_bulk3(Config, MgrNode, AgentNode, GetBulk, PostVerify) ->
 3326:     %% -- 1 --
 3327:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(1,
 3328: 				   1,  1, [], 
 3329: 				   fun verify_ssgb_reply1/1, 
 3330: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3331:     
 3332:     %% -- 2 --
 3333:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(2,
 3334: 				   -1,  1, [], 
 3335: 				   fun verify_ssgb_reply1/1, 
 3336: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3337: 
 3338:     %% -- 3 --
 3339:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(3,
 3340: 				   -1, -1, [], 
 3341: 				   fun verify_ssgb_reply1/1, 
 3342: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3343: 
 3344:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 3345:     %% -- 4 --
 3346:     VF04 = fun(X) -> 
 3347: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, [?sysDescr_instance, endOfMibView]) 
 3348: 	   end,
 3349:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(4,
 3350: 				   2, 0, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]], VF04, 
 3351: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3352: 
 3353:     %% -- 5 --
 3354:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(5,
 3355: 				   1, 2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]], VF04, 
 3356: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3357: 
 3358:     %% -- 6 --
 3359:     VF06 = fun(X) -> 
 3360: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3361: 				      [?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3362: 				       ?sysObjectID_instance, endOfMibView]) 
 3363: 	   end,
 3364:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(6,
 3365: 				   0, 2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]], VF06, 
 3366: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3367: 
 3368:     %% -- 7 --
 3369:     VF07 = fun(X) -> 
 3370: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3371: 				      [?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3372: 				       ?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3373: 				       ?sysObjectID_instance, endOfMibView]) 
 3374: 	   end,
 3375:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(7,
 3376: 				   2, 2, 
 3377: 				   [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1],[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]],
 3378: 				   VF07, 
 3379: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3380: 
 3381:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 3382:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 3383:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 3384: 
 3385:     %% -- 8 --
 3386:     VF08 = fun(X) -> 
 3387: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3388: 				      [?sysDescr_instance, 
 3389: 				       ?sysDescr_instance]) 
 3390: 	   end,
 3391:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(8,
 3392: 				   1, 2, 
 3393: 				   [[sysDescr],[sysDescr],[tTooBig]],
 3394: 				   VF08, 
 3395: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3396: 
 3397:     %% -- 9 --
 3398:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(9,
 3399: 				   1, 12, 
 3400: 				   [[tDescr2], [sysDescr]], 
 3401: 				   fun verify_ssgb_reply1/1, 
 3402: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3403: 
 3404:     %% -- 10 --
 3405:     VF10 = fun(X) -> 
 3406: 		   verify_ssgb_reply3(X, 
 3407: 				      [{?sysDescr,    'NULL'}, 
 3408: 				       {?sysObjectID, 'NULL'},
 3409: 				       {?tGenErr1,    'NULL'},
 3410: 				       {?sysDescr,    'NULL'}]) 
 3411: 	   end,
 3412:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(10,
 3413: 				   2, 2, 
 3414: 				   [[sysDescr], 
 3415: 				    [sysObjectID], 
 3416: 				    [tGenErr1], 
 3417: 				    [sysDescr]],
 3418: 				   VF10, 
 3419: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify), 
 3420: 
 3421:     %% -- 11 --
 3422:     {ok, [TCnt2|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tCnt2),
 3423:     ?IPRINT("TCnt2: ~p", [TCnt2]),
 3424:     VF11 = fun(X) -> 
 3425: 		   verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3426: 				      [{fl([TCnt2,2]), 100}, 
 3427: 				       {fl([TCnt2,2]), endOfMibView}]) 
 3428: 	   end,
 3429:     ok = do_simple_get_bulk3(11,
 3430: 				   0, 2, 
 3431: 				   [[TCnt2, 1]], VF11, 
 3432: 				   GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3433:     
 3434:     ok.
 3435: 
 3436: do_simple_get_bulk3(N, 
 3437: 		    NonRep, MaxRep, Oids, 
 3438: 		    Verify, GetBulk, PostVerify) 
 3439:   when is_function(Verify, 1) andalso 
 3440:        is_function(GetBulk, 3) andalso 
 3441:        is_function(PostVerify) ->
 3442:     ?IPRINT("issue get-bulk command ~w", [N]),
 3443:     case GetBulk(NonRep, MaxRep, Oids) of
 3444: 	{ok, Reply, _Rem} ->
 3445: 	    ?DBG("get-bulk ok:"
 3446: 		 "~n   Reply: ~p"
 3447: 		 "~n   Rem:   ~w", [Reply, _Rem]),
 3448: 	    PostVerify(Verify(Reply));
 3449: 
 3450: 	Error ->
 3451: 	    {error, {unexpected_reply, Error}}
 3452:     end.
 3453:

 3457: simple_async_get_bulk3_cbp_def() ->
 3458:     [{doc, "Simple (async) get_bulk-request - "
 3459:      "Version 3 API (TargetName with send-opts)"}].
 3460: 
 3461: simple_async_get_bulk3_cbp_def(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3462:     simple_async_get_bulk3(sagb3_cbp_def, Config).
 3463: 
 3464: simple_async_get_bulk3(Case, Config) ->
 3465:     ?TC_TRY(Case,
 3466:             fun() -> do_simple_async_get_bulk3(Config) end).
 3467: 
 3468: do_simple_async_get_bulk3(Config) ->
 3469:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3470:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3471:             "~n      ~p~n", [Config]),
 3472: 
 3473:     MgrNode    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3474:     AgentNode  = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 3475:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 3476: 
 3477:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, std_mib()),
 3478:     Test2Mib = test2_mib(Config), 
 3479:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 3480:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode, Test2Mib),
 3481: 
 3482:     Self  = self(), 
 3483:     Msg   = simple_async_get_bulk3, 
 3484:     Fun   = fun() -> Self ! Msg end,
 3485:     Extra = {?SNMPM_EXTRA_INFO_TAG, Fun}, 
 3486:     SendOpts = 
 3487: 	[
 3488: 	 {extra, Extra}
 3489: 	], 
 3490: 
 3491:     GetBulk = 
 3492: 	fun(Data) ->
 3493: 		async_gb_exec3(MgrNode, TargetName, Data, SendOpts)
 3494: 	end,
 3495:     PostVerify = fun(ok)  -> receive Msg -> ok end;
 3496: 		    (Res) -> Res 
 3497: 		 end,
 3498: 
 3499:     Res = do_simple_async_get_bulk3(MgrNode, AgentNode, GetBulk, PostVerify),
 3500:     display_log(Config),
 3501:     Res.
 3502: 
 3503: do_simple_async_get_bulk3(MgrNode, AgentNode, GetBulk, PostVerify) ->
 3504:     %% We re-use the verification functions from the ssgb test-case
 3505:     VF04 = fun(X) -> 
 3506: 		   PostVerify(
 3507: 		     verify_ssgb_reply2(X, [?sysDescr_instance, endOfMibView]))
 3508: 	   end,
 3509:     VF06 = fun(X) -> 
 3510: 		   PostVerify(
 3511: 		     verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3512: 					[?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3513: 					 ?sysObjectID_instance, endOfMibView]))
 3514: 	   end,
 3515:     VF07 = fun(X) -> 
 3516: 		   PostVerify(
 3517: 		     verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3518: 					[?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3519: 					 ?sysDescr_instance,    endOfMibView,
 3520: 					 ?sysObjectID_instance, endOfMibView]))
 3521: 	   end,
 3522:     VF08 = fun(X) -> 
 3523: 		   PostVerify(
 3524: 		     verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3525: 					[?sysDescr_instance, 
 3526: 					 ?sysDescr_instance])) 
 3527: 	   end,
 3528:     VF10 = fun(X) -> 
 3529: 		   PostVerify(
 3530: 		     verify_ssgb_reply3(X, 
 3531: 					[{?sysDescr,    'NULL'}, 
 3532: 					 {?sysObjectID, 'NULL'},
 3533: 					 {?tGenErr1,    'NULL'},
 3534: 					 {?sysDescr,    'NULL'}])) 
 3535: 	   end,
 3536:     {ok, [TCnt2|_]} = mgr_user_name_to_oid(MgrNode, tCnt2),
 3537:     VF11 = fun(X) -> 
 3538: 		   PostVerify(
 3539: 		     verify_ssgb_reply2(X, 
 3540: 					[{fl([TCnt2,2]), 100}, 
 3541: 					 {fl([TCnt2,2]), endOfMibView}]))
 3542: 	   end,
 3543:     Requests = [
 3544: 		{ 1,  
 3545: 		  {1,  1, []}, 
 3546: 		  GetBulk, 
 3547: 		  fun(X) -> PostVerify(verify_ssgb_reply1(X)) end},
 3548: 		{ 2, 
 3549: 		  {-1,  1, []}, 
 3550: 		  GetBulk, 
 3551: 		  fun(X) -> PostVerify(verify_ssgb_reply1(X)) end},
 3552: 		{ 3, 
 3553: 		  {-1, -1, []}, 
 3554: 		  GetBulk, 
 3555: 		  fun(X) -> PostVerify(verify_ssgb_reply1(X)) end},
 3556: 		{ 4,  
 3557: 		  {2,  0, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]}, 
 3558: 		  GetBulk, 
 3559: 		  VF04},
 3560: 		{ 5,  
 3561: 		  {1,  2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]}, 
 3562: 		  GetBulk, 
 3563: 		  VF04},
 3564: 		{ 6,  
 3565: 		  {0,  2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]}, 
 3566: 		  GetBulk, 
 3567: 		  VF06},
 3568: 		{ 7,  
 3569: 		  {2,  2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1],[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]}, 
 3570: 		  GetBulk, 
 3571: 		  VF07},
 3572: 		{ 8,  
 3573: 		  {1,  2, [[sysDescr],[sysDescr],[tTooBig]]}, 
 3574: 		  GetBulk, 
 3575: 		  VF08},
 3576: 		{ 9,  
 3577: 		  {1, 12, [[tDescr2], [sysDescr]]}, 
 3578: 		  GetBulk, 
 3579: 		  fun(X) -> PostVerify(verify_ssgb_reply1(X)) end},
 3580: 		{10,  
 3581: 		 {2,  2, [[sysDescr],[sysObjectID], [tGenErr1],[sysDescr]]}, 
 3582: 		 GetBulk, 
 3583: 		 VF10},
 3584: 		{11,  
 3585: 		 {0,  2, [[TCnt2, 1]]}, 
 3586: 		 GetBulk,
 3587: 		 VF11}, 
 3588: 		{12,  
 3589: 		 {2,  0, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]}, 
 3590: 		 GetBulk,
 3591: 		 VF04},
 3592: 		{13,  
 3593: 		 {1, 12, [[tDescr2], [sysDescr]]},
 3594: 		 GetBulk, 
 3595: 		 fun(X) -> PostVerify(verify_ssgb_reply1(X)) end},
 3596: 		{14,  
 3597: 		 {2,  2, [[sysDescr],[sysObjectID],[tGenErr1],[sysDescr]]},
 3598: 		 GetBulk, 
 3599: 		 VF10},
 3600: 		{15,  
 3601: 		 {0,  2, [[TCnt2, 1]]},
 3602: 		 GetBulk, 
 3603: 		 VF11},
 3604: 		{16,  
 3605: 		 {2,  2, [[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1],[sysDescr],[1,3,7,1]]},
 3606: 		 GetBulk, 
 3607: 		 VF07},
 3608: 		{17,  
 3609: 		 {2,  2, [[sysDescr],[sysObjectID], [tGenErr1],[sysDescr]]},
 3610: 		 GetBulk, 
 3611: 		 VF10}
 3612: 	       ],
 3613: 
 3614:     ?IPRINT("manager info when starting test: "
 3615:             "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 3616:     ?IPRINT("agent info when starting test: "
 3617:             "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),
 3618: 
 3619:     ok = async_exec(Requests, []),
 3620: 
 3621:     ?IPRINT("manager info when ending test: "
 3622:             "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 3623:     ?IPRINT("agent info when ending test: "
 3624:             "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),
 3625: 
 3626:     ok.
 3627: 
 3628: 
 3629: async_gb_exec3(Node, TargetName, {NR, MR, Oids}, SendOpts) ->
 3630:     mgr_user_async_get_bulk2(Node, TargetName, NR, MR, Oids, SendOpts).
 3631:

 3656:     [{doc, "Simple message exchange using v3 (MD5) messages"}].

 3659:     simple_v3_exchange(Config).
 3660: 
 3661: simple_v3_exchange_sha() ->
 3662:     [{doc, "Simple message exchange using v3 (SHA) messages"}].
 3663: 
 3664: simple_v3_exchange_sha(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3665:     simple_v3_exchange(Config).
 3666: 
 3667: simple_v3_exchange_sha224() ->
 3668:     [{doc, "Simple message exchange using v3 (SHA224) messages"}].
 3669: 
 3670: simple_v3_exchange_sha224(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3671:     simple_v3_exchange(Config).
 3672: 
 3673: simple_v3_exchange_sha256() ->
 3674:     [{doc, "Simple message exchange using v3 (SHA256) messages"}].
 3675: 
 3676: simple_v3_exchange_sha256(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3677:     simple_v3_exchange(Config).
 3678: 
 3679: simple_v3_exchange_sha384() ->
 3680:     [{doc, "Simple message exchange using v3 (SHA384) messages"}].
 3681: 
 3682: simple_v3_exchange_sha384(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3683:     simple_v3_exchange(Config).
 3684: 
 3685: simple_v3_exchange_sha512() ->
 3686:     [{doc, "Simple message exchange using v3 (SHA512) messages"}].
 3687: 
 3688: simple_v3_exchange_sha512(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3689:     simple_v3_exchange(Config).
 3690: 
 3691: %% This difference between these test cases are handled in the
 3692: %% init_per_testcase function (basically auth algorithm).
 3693: simple_v3_exchange(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3694:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3695:             "~n      ~p", [Config]),
 3696: 
 3697:     Node       = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3698:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Config),
 3699: 
 3700:     Oids1 = [?sysDescr_instance],
 3701:     ?IPRINT("initial try get (expect failure and a report)"),
 3702:     {error, timeout} = mgr_user_sync_get2(Node, TargetName, Oids1, []),
 3703:     receive
 3704:         {async_event, TargetName, {report, {noError, 0, [#varbind{oid = ?usmStatsNotInTimeWindows_instance}]}} = Report1} ->
 3705:             ?IPRINT("received expected report: "
 3706:                     "~n      ~p", [Report1]),
 3707:             ok
 3708:     end,
 3709:     ?IPRINT("second try get (expect success)"),
 3710:     {ok, Reply2, _} = mgr_user_sync_get2(Node, TargetName, Oids1, []),
 3711:     case Reply2 of
 3712:         {noError, 0, [#varbind{oid = ?sysDescr_instance}]} ->
 3713:             ?IPRINT("expected get success"),
 3714:             display_log(Config),
 3715:             ok;
 3716:         X ->
 3717:             {error, X}
 3718:     end.
 3719: 
 3720: 
 3721: 
 3722: %%======================================================================
 3723: 
 3724: discovery(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3725:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 3726: 
 3727: 
 3728: %%======================================================================
 3729: %% 
 3730: %% Utility functions for cases trap1 and trap2
 3731: %% 
 3732: 
 3733: collect_traps(N) ->
 3734:     collect_traps(N, []).
 3735: 
 3736: collect_traps(0, TrapInfo) ->
 3737:     TrapInfo;
 3738: collect_traps(N, Acc) ->
 3739:     receive
 3740: 	{async_event, _From, {trap, TrapInfo}} ->
 3741: 	    ?IPRINT("collect_traps -> received trap: "
 3742:                     "~n      ~p", [TrapInfo]),
 3743: 	    collect_traps(N-1, [TrapInfo|Acc])
 3744:     after 10000 ->
 3745: 	    ?WPRINT("collect_traps -> still awaiting ~w trap(s) - giving up", [N]),
 3746: 	    Acc
 3747:     end.
 3748: 
 3749: verify_traps([], []) ->
 3750:     ?IPRINT("verify_traps -> done"),
 3751:     ok;
 3752: verify_traps([], Verifiers) ->
 3753:     ?IPRINT("verify_traps -> done when ~w verifiers remain", [length(Verifiers)]),
 3754:     {error, {failed_verify, [Id || {Id, _} <- Verifiers]}};
 3755: verify_traps([Trap|Traps], Verifiers0) ->
 3756:     ?IPRINT("verify_traps -> entry"),
 3757:     case verify_trap(Trap, Verifiers0) of
 3758: 	{ok, Id} ->
 3759: 	    ?IPRINT("verify_traps -> trap verified: ~p", [Id]),
 3760: 	    Verifiers = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, Verifiers0),
 3761: 	    verify_traps(Traps, Verifiers);
 3762: 	error ->
 3763: 	    ?EPRINT("verify_traps -> failed verifying trap: "
 3764:                     "~n      ~p", [Trap]),
 3765: 	    {error, {failed_verifying_trap, Trap}}
 3766:     end.
 3767: 
 3768: verify_trap(Trap, []) ->
 3769:     ?EPRINT("verify_trap -> could not verify trap:"
 3770:             "~n   Trap: ~p", [Trap]),
 3771:     error;
 3772: verify_trap(Trap, [{Id, Verifier}|Verifiers]) ->
 3773:     ?IPRINT("verify_trap -> entry with"
 3774:             "~n   Id:   ~p"
 3775:             "~n   Trap: ~p", [Id, Trap]),
 3776:     case Verifier(Trap) of
 3777: 	ok ->
 3778: 	    ?IPRINT("verify_trap -> verified"),
 3779: 	    {ok, Id};
 3780: 	{error, _} ->
 3781: 	    ?NPRINT("verify_trap -> not verified"),
 3782: 	    verify_trap(Trap, Verifiers)
 3783:     end.
 3784: 
 3785: 
 3786: %%======================================================================
 3787: 
 3788: trap1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3789:     ?TC_TRY(trap1,
 3790:             fun() -> do_trap1(Config) end).
 3791: 
 3792: do_trap1(Config) ->
 3793:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 3794:             "~n      ~p"
 3795:             "~n", [Config]),
 3796: 
 3797:     MgrNode   = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 3798:     AgentNode = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 3799: 
 3800:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, snmpv2_mib()),
 3801:     Test2Mib      = test2_mib(Config), 
 3802:     TestTrapMib   = test_trap_mib(Config), 
 3803:     TestTrapv2Mib = test_trap_v2_mib(Config), 
 3804:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 3805:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, TestTrapMib),
 3806:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, TestTrapv2Mib),
 3807:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  Test2Mib),
 3808:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  TestTrapMib),
 3809:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  TestTrapv2Mib),
 3810: 
 3811:     %% Version 1 trap verification function:
 3812:     VerifyTrap_v1 = 
 3813: 	fun(Ent, Gen, Spec, ExpVBs, Trap) ->
 3814: 		case Trap of
 3815: 		    {Ent, Gen, Spec, _Timestamp, VBs} ->
 3816: 			?IPRINT("trap info as expected"), 
 3817: 			case (catch validate_vbs(MgrNode, 
 3818: 						 ExpVBs, VBs)) of
 3819: 			    ok ->
 3820: 				?IPRINT("valid trap"),
 3821: 				ok;
 3822: 			    Error ->
 3823: 				?EPRINT("invalid trap: "
 3824:                                         "~n      ~p", [Error]),
 3825: 				Error
 3826: 			end;
 3827: 		    {Enteprise, Generic, Spec, Timestamp, VBs} ->
 3828: 		       ?EPRINT("unepxected v1 trap info:"
 3829:                                "~n   Enteprise: ~p"
 3830:                                "~n   Generic:   ~p"
 3831:                                "~n   Spec:      ~p"
 3832:                                "~n   Timestamp: ~p"
 3833:                                "~n   VBs:       ~p", 
 3834:                                [Enteprise, Generic, Spec, Timestamp, VBs]),
 3835: 			ExpTrap = {Ent, Gen, Spec, ignore, ExpVBs}, 
 3836: 			Reason = {unexpected_trap, {ExpTrap, Trap}},
 3837: 			{error, Reason};
 3838: 		    {Err, Idx, VBs} ->
 3839: 			?EPRINT("unexpected trap info: "
 3840:                                 "~n   Err: ~p"
 3841:                                 "~n   Idx: ~p"
 3842:                                 "~n   VBs: ~p", [Err, Idx, VBs]),
 3843: 			Reason = {unexpected_status, {Err, Idx, VBs}},
 3844: 			{error, Reason}
 3845: 		end
 3846: 	end,
 3847: 
 3848:     %% Version 2 trap verification function:
 3849:     VerifyTrap_v2 = 
 3850: 	fun(ExpVBs, Trap) ->
 3851: 		case Trap of
 3852: 		    {noError, 0, VBs0} ->
 3853: 			?IPRINT("trap info as expected: "
 3854:                                 "~n      ~p", [VBs0]), 
 3855: 			%% The first two are a timestamp and oid
 3856: 			[_,_|VBs] = VBs0,
 3857: 			case (catch validate_vbs(MgrNode, 
 3858: 						 ExpVBs, VBs)) of
 3859: 			    ok ->
 3860: 				?IPRINT("valid trap"),
 3861: 				ok;
 3862: 			    Error ->
 3863: 				?EPRINT("invalid trap: "
 3864:                                         "~n      ~p", [Error]),
 3865: 				Error
 3866: 			end;

 3868: 			?EPRINT("unexpected error status: "
 3869:                                 "~n   Err: ~p"
 3870:                                 "~n   Idx: ~p"
 3871:                                 "~n   VBs: ~p", [Err, Idx, VBs]),
 3872: 			Reason = {unexpected_status, {Err, Idx, VBs}},
 3873: 			{error, Reason}
 3874: 		end
 3875: 	end,

 4147:     ?TC_TRY(inform1,

 4150: do_inform1(Config) ->
 4151:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 4152:             "~n      ~p"

 4154: 
 4155:     MgrNode   = ?config(manager_node, Config),

 4170:     Cmd1 = 
 4171: 	fun() ->
 4172: 		?IPRINT("manager info: "

 4187:     Cmd3 = 
 4188: 	fun() ->
 4189: 		receive
 4190: 		    {async_event, From, {inform, Pid, Inform}} ->
 4191: 			?IPRINT("received inform"),
 4192: 			case Inform of
 4193: 			    {noError, 0, VBs} when is_list(VBs) ->
 4194: 				case (catch validate_testTrapv22_vbs(MgrNode, 
 4195: 								     VBs)) of
 4196: 				    ok ->
 4197: 					?IPRINT("valid inform"),
 4198: 					Pid ! {handle_inform_no_response, 
 4199: 					       From}, 
 4200: 					ok;
 4201: 				    Error ->
 4202: 					?EPRINT("invalid inform: "
 4203:                                                 "~n      ~p", [Error]),
 4204: 					Error
 4205: 				end;
 4206: 			    {Err, Idx, VBs} ->
 4207: 				?EPRINT("unexpected error status: "
 4208:                                         "~n   Err: ~p"
 4209:                                         "~n   Idx: ~p"
 4210:                                         "~n   VBs: ~p", [Err, Idx, VBs]),
 4211: 				Reason = {unexpected_status, {Err, Idx, VBs}},
 4212: 				{error, Reason}
 4213: 			end
 4214: 		after 10000 ->
 4215: 			receive 
 4216: 			    Any ->
 4217: 				{error, {timeout_crap, Any}}
 4218: 			after 1000 ->
 4219: 				{error, timeout}
 4220: 			end
 4221: 		end
 4222: 	end,
 4223:

 4225: 	fun() ->
 4226: 		receive

 4230: 			    {noError, 0, VBs} when is_list(VBs) ->

 4243: 				?EPRINT("unexpected error status: "

 4346: 				case (catch validate_testTrapv22_vbs(MgrNode, 
 4347: 								     VBs)) of
 4348: 				    ok ->
 4349: 					?IPRINT("valid inform"),
 4350: 					Pid ! {handle_inform_no_response, 
 4351: 					       From}, 
 4352: 					ok;
 4353: 				    Error ->
 4354: 					?IPRINT("invalid inform: "
 4355:                                                 "~n      ~p", [Error]),
 4356: 					Error
 4357: 				end;
 4358: 			    {Err, Idx, VBs} ->
 4359: 				?EPRINT("unexpected error status: "
 4360:                                         "~n   Err: ~p"
 4361:                                         "~n   Idx: ~p"
 4362:                                         "~n   VBs: ~p", [Err, Idx, VBs]),
 4363: 				Reason = {unexpected_status, {Err, Idx, VBs}},
 4364: 				{error, Reason}
 4365: 			end
 4366: 		after 10000 ->
 4367: 			receive 
 4368: 			    Any ->
 4369: 				{error, {timeout_crap, Any}}
 4370: 			after 1000 ->
 4371: 				{error, timeout}
 4372: 			end
 4373: 		end
 4374: 	end,
 4375: 
 4376:     Cmd5 = 
 4377: 	fun() ->
 4378: 		receive
 4379: 		    {async_event, From, {inform, Pid, Inform}} ->
 4380: 			?IPRINT("received inform"),

 4382: 			    {noError, 0, VBs} when is_list(VBs) ->
 4383: 				case (catch validate_testTrapv22_vbs(MgrNode, 
 4384: 								     VBs)) of
 4385: 				    ok ->
 4386: 					?IPRINT("valid inform"),
 4387: 					Pid ! {handle_inform_response, From}, 
 4388: 					ok;
 4389: 				    Error ->
 4390: 					?EPRINT("invalid inform: "

 4392: 					Error
 4393: 				end;

 4395: 				?EPRINT("unexpected error status: "

 4397:                                         "~n   Idx: ~p"
 4398:                                         "~n   VBs: ~p", [Err, Idx, VBs]),
 4399: 				Reason = {unexpected_status, {Err, Idx, VBs}},
 4400: 				{error, Reason}

 4600:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "

 4602: 
 4603:     MgrNode   = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 4604:     AgentNode = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 4605: 
 4606:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, snmpv2_mib()),
 4607:     Test2Mib      = test2_mib(Config), 
 4608:     TestTrapMib   = test_trap_mib(Config), 
 4609:     TestTrapv2Mib = test_trap_v2_mib(Config), 
 4610:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 4611:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, TestTrapMib),
 4612:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, TestTrapv2Mib),
 4613:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  Test2Mib),
 4614:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  TestTrapMib),
 4615:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  TestTrapv2Mib),
 4616: 
 4617:     Cmd1 = 
 4618: 	fun() ->
 4619: 		?IPRINT("manager info: "
 4620:                         "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 4621: 		?IPRINT("agent info: "
 4622:                         "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),

 4637: 			case Inform of

 4640: 								     VBs)) of
 4641: 				    ok ->

 4644: 					%% configured the manager in

 4705: %% 	 {4, "Await error info (because of erroneous config)", Cmd4},

 4713: 
 4714: 
 4715: %%======================================================================
 4716: %% 
 4717: %% Test: ts:run(snmp, snmp_manager_test, inform_swarm_cbp_def, [batch]).
 4718: 
 4719: inform_swarm_cbp_def(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4720:     inform_swarm(is_cbp_def, 1500, Config).
 4721: 
 4722: inform_swarm_cbp_temp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4723:     inform_swarm(is_cbp_temp, 1500, Config).
 4724: 
 4725: inform_swarm_cbp_perm(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4726:     inform_swarm(is_cbp_perm, 1800, Config).
 4727: 
 4728: inform_swarm(Case, NumI, Config) ->
 4729:     ?TC_TRY(Case,
 4730:             fun() -> do_inform_swarm(NumI, Config) end).
 4731: 
 4732: do_inform_swarm(NumI, Config) ->
 4733:     %% process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4734:     ?IPRINT("starting with"
 4735:             "~n      NumI:   ~p"
 4736:             "~n      Config: ~p"
 4737:             "~n", [NumI, Config]),
 4738: 
 4739:     MgrNode   = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 4740:     AgentNode = ?config(agent_node,   Config),
 4741:     Factor    = ?config(snmp_factor,  Config),
 4742: 
 4743:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, snmpv2_mib()),
 4744:     Test2Mib      = test2_mib(Config), 
 4745:     TestTrapMib   = test_trap_mib(Config), 
 4746:     TestTrapv2Mib = test_trap_v2_mib(Config), 
 4747:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, Test2Mib),
 4748:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, TestTrapMib),
 4749:     ok = mgr_user_load_mib(MgrNode, TestTrapv2Mib),
 4750:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  Test2Mib),
 4751:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  TestTrapMib),
 4752:     ok = agent_load_mib(AgentNode,  TestTrapv2Mib),
 4753:     NumInforms = NumI div Factor,
 4754: 
 4755:     Collector = self(),
 4756: 
 4757:     Generator = 
 4758: 	erlang:spawn(
 4759: 	  fun() ->
 4760: 		  receive
 4761: 		      {Collector, start} ->
 4762: 			  ok
 4763: 		  end,
 4764: 		  Seqs = lists:seq(1, NumInforms),
 4765: 		  lists:foreach(
 4766: 		    fun(N) ->
 4767: 			    ?IPRINT("send notification ~w", [N]),
 4768: 			    agent_send_notif(AgentNode, 
 4769: 					     testTrapv22, 
 4770: 					     {{inform2_tag1, N}, Collector},
 4771: 					     "standard inform",
 4772: 					     []),
 4773: 			    %% Sleep 1000 ms every 100th notif
 4774: 			    %% Sleep 100  ms every 10th notif
 4775: 			    if
 4776:                                 N rem 100 == 0 ->
 4777:                                     Sleep = 1000,
 4778: 				    ?IPRINT("sleep ~w [~w]", [Sleep, N]),
 4779:                                     ?SLEEP(Sleep);
 4780: 				N rem 10 == 0 ->
 4781:                                     Sleep = 100,
 4782: 				    ?IPRINT("sleep ~w [~w]", [Sleep, N]),
 4783: 				    ?SLEEP(Sleep);
 4784: 				true ->
 4785: 				    ok
 4786: 			    end
 4787: 		    end,
 4788: 		    Seqs),
 4789: 		  ok
 4790: 	  end), 
 4791: 
 4792:     Cmd1 = 
 4793: 	fun() ->
 4794: 		?IPRINT("manager info: "
 4795:                         "~n      ~p", [mgr_info(MgrNode)]),
 4796: 		?IPRINT("agent info: "
 4797:                         "~n      ~p", [agent_info(AgentNode)]),
 4798: 		ok
 4799: 	end,
 4800: 
 4801:     Cmd2 = fun() -> Generator ! {Collector, start}, ok end,
 4802: 
 4803:     Cmd3 = 
 4804: 	fun() ->
 4805: 		inform_swarm_collector(NumInforms)
 4806: 	end,
 4807: 
 4808: 
 4809:     Cmd4 = fun() -> ?SLEEP(1000), ok end,
 4810: 
 4811:     Commands = 
 4812: 	[
 4813: 	 {1, "Manager and agent info at start of test",             Cmd1},
 4814: 	 {2, ?F("Send ~p notification(s) from agent", [NumInforms]), Cmd2},
 4815: 	 {3, "Await send-ack(s)/inform(s)/response(s)",             Cmd3},
 4816: 	 {4, "Sleep some time (1 sec)",                             Cmd4},
 4817: 	 {5, "Manager and agent info after test completion",        Cmd1}
 4818: 	],
 4819: 
 4820:     Res = command_handler(Commands),
 4821:     display_log(Config),
 4822:     Res.
 4823: 
 4824: 
 4825: inform_swarm_collector(N) ->
 4826:     inform_swarm_collector(N, 0, 0, 0, ?SECS(60)).
 4827: 
 4828: %% Note that we need to deal with re-transmissions!
 4829: %% That is, the agent did not receive the ack in time,
 4830: %% and therefore did a re-transmit. This means that we
 4831: %% expect to receive more inform's then we actually
 4832: %% sent. So for success we assume:
 4833: %%
 4834: %%     SentAckCnt =  N
 4835: %%     RespCnt    =  N
 4836: %%     RecvCnt    >= N
 4837: %% 
 4838: inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt, _) 
 4839:   when ((N == SentAckCnt) and 
 4840: 	(N == RespCnt)    and
 4841: 	(N =< RecvCnt)) ->
 4842:     ?IPRINT("inform_swarm_collector -> done when"
 4843:             "~n      N:          ~w"
 4844:             "~n      SentAckCnt: ~w"
 4845:             "~n      RecvCnt:    ~w"
 4846:             "~n      RespCnt:    ~w", [N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt]),
 4847:     ok;
 4848: inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt, Timeout) ->
 4849:     %% ?IPRINT("inform_swarm_collector -> entry with"
 4850:     %%         "~n      N:          ~w"
 4851:     %%         "~n      SentAckCnt: ~w"
 4852:     %%         "~n      RecvCnt:    ~w"
 4853:     %%         "~n      RespCnt:    ~w", [N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt]),
 4854:     receive
 4855: 	{snmp_targets, {inform2_tag1, Id}, [_Addr]} ->
 4856: 	    ?IPRINT("received inform-sent acknowledgement for ~w", [Id]),
 4857: 	    inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt+1, RecvCnt, RespCnt, 
 4858: 				   Timeout);
 4859: 
 4860: 	%% The manager has received the actual inform
 4861: 	{async_event, From, {inform, Pid, Inform}} ->
 4862: 	    ?IPRINT("received inform (~p of ~p)", [RecvCnt+1, N]),
 4863: 	    case Inform of
 4864: 		{noError, 0, VBs} when is_list(VBs) ->
 4865: 		    Pid ! {handle_inform_response, From}, 
 4866: 		    inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt+1, RespCnt, 
 4867: 					   Timeout);
 4868: 		{Err, Idx, VBs} ->
 4869: 		    ?EPRINT("Unexpected error status: "
 4870:                             "~n   Err: ~p"
 4871:                             "~n   Idx: ~p"
 4872:                             "~n   VBs: ~p", [Err, Idx, VBs]),
 4873: 		    Reason = {unexpected_status, {Err, Idx, VBs}},
 4874: 		    {error, Reason}
 4875: 	    end;
 4876: 
 4877: 	%% The agent has received ack from the manager 
 4878: 	{snmp_notification, {inform2_tag1, Id}, {got_response, Addr}} ->
 4879: 	    ?IPRINT("received expected \"got response\" for ~w "
 4880:                     "notification from: "
 4881:                     "~n      ~p", [Id, Addr]),
 4882: 	    inform_swarm_collector(N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt+1, 
 4883: 				   Timeout);
 4884: 
 4885: 	%% The agent did not received ack from the manager in time 
 4886: 	{snmp_notification, inform2_tag1, {no_response, Addr}} ->
 4887: 	    ?EPRINT("Received expected \"no response\" notification "
 4888:                     "from: "
 4889:                     "~n      ~p", [Addr]),
 4890: 	    Reason = {no_response, Addr, {N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt}},
 4891: 	    {error, Reason}
 4892: 
 4893:     after Timeout ->
 4894: 	    %% Give up when we have been dead in the water for Timeout ms
 4895:             ?EPRINT("timeout when"
 4896:                     "~n   N:          ~p"
 4897:                     "~n   SentAckCnt: ~p"
 4898:                     "~n   RecvCnt:    ~p"
 4899:                     "~n   RespCnt:    ~p",
 4900:                     [N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt]),
 4901: 	    {error, {timeout, N, SentAckCnt, RecvCnt, RespCnt}}
 4902:     end.
 4903: 		    
 4904: 
 4905: %%======================================================================
 4906: 
 4907: report(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4908:     ?SKIP(not_yet_implemented).
 4909: 
 4910:

 4914: otp8015_1() ->
 4915:     [{doc, "OTP-8015:1 - testing the new api-function."}].
 4916: 
 4917: otp8015_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4918:     Pre = fun() ->
 4919:                   SCO     = ?config(socket_create_opts, Config),
 4920:                   ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir,   Config),
 4921:                   DbDir   = ?config(manager_db_dir,     Config),
 4922: 
 4923:                   write_manager_conf(ConfDir),
 4924: 
 4925:                   Opts = [{server,     [{verbosity, trace}]},
 4926:                           {net_if,     [{verbosity, trace}, {options, SCO}]},
 4927:                           {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 4928:                           {config,     [{verbosity, trace},
 4929:                                         {dir,       ConfDir},
 4930:                                         {db_dir,    DbDir}]}],
 4931: 
 4932:                   ?IPRINT("starting manager"),
 4933:                   ok = snmpm:start_link(Opts),
 4934: 
 4935:                   ?SLEEP(1000),
 4936:                   ok
 4937:           end,
 4938:     Case = fun(_) -> do_otp8015_1(Config) end,
 4939:     Post = fun(_) ->
 4940:                    ?IPRINT("stop manager"),
 4941:                    ok = snmpm:stop(),
 4942:                    ?SLEEP(1000),
 4943:                    ok
 4944:            end,
 4945:     ?TC_TRY(otp8015_1, Pre, Case, Post).
 4946: 
 4947: do_otp8015_1(Config) ->
 4948:     ?IPRINT("starting with Config: "
 4949:            "~n      ~p"
 4950:            "~n", [Config]),
 4951: 
 4952:     snmpm:load_mib(std_mib()), 
 4953:     snmpm:load_mib(test_trap_mib(Config)),
 4954: 
 4955:     ?IPRINT("manager started, now sleep some"),
 4956: 
 4957:     ?SLEEP(1000),
 4958: 
 4959:     ?IPRINT("loaded mibs: ~p", [snmpm:which_mibs()]),
 4960: 
 4961:     ?IPRINT("get some type(s) from the mibs"),    
 4962:     {ok, 'Counter32'} = snmpm:oid_to_type(?snmpOutTraps), 
 4963:     {ok, [IfIndex]}   = snmpm:name_to_oid(ifIndex),
 4964:     {ok, 'INTEGER'}   = snmpm:oid_to_type(IfIndex),
 4965:     
 4966:     ?IPRINT("end"),
 4967:     ok.
