 4982: 
 4983: %%======================================================================
 4984: %% async snmp utility functions
 4985: %%======================================================================
 4986: 
 4987: async_exec([], Acc) ->
 4988:     ?IPRINT("all async request's sent => now await responses"),
 4989:     async_verify(async_collector(Acc, []));
 4990: async_exec([{Id, Data, Exec, Ver}|Reqs], Acc) ->
 4991:     ?IPRINT("issue async request ~w", [Id]),
 4992:     {ok, ReqId} = Exec(Data),
 4993:     async_exec(Reqs, [{ReqId, Id, Ver}|Acc]).
 4994: 
 4995: async_collector([], Acc) ->
 4996:     ?IPRINT("received replies for all requests - now sort"),
 4997:     lists:keysort(1, Acc);
 4998: async_collector(Expected, Acc) ->
 4999:     receive
 5000: 	{async_event, ReqId, Reply} ->
 5001: 	    ?IPRINT("received async event with request-id ~w", [ReqId]),
 5002: 	    case lists:keysearch(ReqId, 1, Expected) of
 5003: 		{value, {_, Id, Ver}} ->
 5004: 		    ?IPRINT("event was for request ~w", [Id]),
 5005: 		    Expected2 = lists:keydelete(ReqId, 1, Expected),
 5006: 		    async_collector(Expected2, [{Id, Ver, Reply}|Acc]);
 5007: 		false ->
 5008: 		    % Duplicate reply?
 5009:                     ?EPRINT("unexpected async event: "
 5010:                             "~n      ReqId: ~p"
 5011:                             "~n      Reply: ~p", [ReqId, Reply]),
 5012: 		    ?FAIL({unexpected_async_event, ReqId, Reply})
 5013: 	    end
 5014:     after 10000 ->
 5015: 	    ?FAIL({timeout, {Expected, Acc}})
 5016:     end.
 5017: 
 5018: async_verify([]) ->
 5019:     ok;
 5020: async_verify([{Id, Verify, Reply}|Replies]) ->
 5021:     ?IPRINT("verify reply ~w", [Id]),
 5022:     Verify(Reply),
 5023:     async_verify(Replies).
 5024: 
 5025: 
 5026: 
 5027: %%======================================================================
 5028: %% Internal functions
 5029: %%======================================================================
 5030: 
 5031: 
 5032: %% -- Verify varbinds --
 5033: 
 5034: validate_vbs(Node, ExpVBs, VBs) ->
 5035:     validate_vbs(purify_oids(Node, ExpVBs), VBs).
 5036: 
 5037: validate_testTrapv22_vbs(Node, VBs) ->
 5038:     ExpVBs = [{[sysUpTime, 0], any},
 5039: 	      {[snmpTrapOID, 0], ?system ++ [0,1]}],
 5040:     validate_vbs(purify_oids(Node, ExpVBs), VBs).
 5041: 
 5042: validate_vbs([], []) ->
 5043:     ok;
 5044: validate_vbs(Exp, []) ->
 5045:     {error, {expected_vbs, Exp}};
 5046: validate_vbs([], VBs) ->
 5047:     {error, {unexpected_vbs, VBs}};
 5048: validate_vbs([any|Exp], [_|VBs]) ->
 5049:     validate_vbs(Exp, VBs);
 5050: validate_vbs([{_, any}|Exp], [#varbind{}|VBs]) ->
 5051:     validate_vbs(Exp, VBs);
 5052: validate_vbs([{Oid, Val}|Exp], [#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Val}|VBs]) ->
 5053:     validate_vbs(Exp, VBs);
 5054: validate_vbs([{Oid, Val1}|_], [#varbind{oid = Oid, value = Val2}|_]) ->
 5055:     {error, {unexpected_vb_value, Oid, Val1, Val2}};
 5056: validate_vbs([{Oid1, _}|_], [#varbind{oid = Oid2}|_]) ->
 5057:     {error, {unexpected_vb_oid, Oid1, Oid2}}.
 5058: 
 5059: purify_oids(_, []) ->
 5060:     [];
 5061: purify_oids(Node, [{Oid, Val}|Oids]) ->
 5062:     [{purify_oid(Node, Oid), Val}| purify_oids(Node, Oids)].
 5063: 
 5064: purify_oid(Node, Oid) ->
 5065:     case mgr_user_purify_oid(Node, Oid) of
 5066: 	Oid2 when is_list(Oid2) ->
 5067: 	    Oid2;
 5068: 	{error, _} = Error ->
 5069: 	    throw(Error)
 5070:     end.
 5071: 
 5072: 
 5073: %% -- Test case command handler (executor) ---
 5074: 
 5075: command_handler([]) ->
 5076:     ok;
 5077: command_handler([{No, Desc, Cmd}|Cmds]) ->
 5078:     ?IPRINT("command_handler -> command ~w: "
 5079:             "~n   ~s", [No, Desc]),
 5080:     case (catch Cmd()) of
 5081: 	ok ->
 5082:             ?IPRINT("command_handler -> ~w: ok", [No]),
 5083:             command_handler(Cmds);
 5084:         {error, Reason} ->
 5085:             ?EPRINT("Command_handler -> ~w error: "
 5086:                     "~n      ~p", [No, Reason]),
 5087:             ?FAIL({command_failed, No, Reason});
 5088:         Error ->
 5089:             ?EPRINT("Command_handler -> ~w unexpected: "
 5090:                     "~n      ~p", [No, Error]),
 5091:             ?FAIL({unexpected_command_result, No, Error})
 5092:     end.
 5093: 
 5094: 
 5095: %% -- Misc manager functions --
 5096: 
 5097: init_manager(Case, AutoInform, Config) ->
 5098: 
 5099:     ?IPRINT("init_manager -> entry with"
 5100:             "~n   AutoInform: ~p"
 5101:             "~n   Config:     ~p", [AutoInform, Config]),
 5102: 
 5103:     %% -- 
 5104:     %% Start node
 5105:     %% 
 5106: 
 5107:     {Peer, Node} = start_node(lists:concat([Case, "-mgr"])),
 5108: 
 5109:     %% The point with this (try catch block) is to be 
 5110:     %% able to do some cleanup in case we fail to 
 5111:     %% start some of the apps. That is, if we fail to 
 5112:     %% start the apps (mnesia, crypto and snmp agent) 
 5113:     %% we stop the (agent) node!
 5114: 
 5115:     try
 5116: 	begin
 5117: 
 5118: 	    %% -- 
 5119: 	    %% Start and initiate crypto on manager node
 5120: 	    %% 
 5121: 
 5122: 	    ok = init_crypto(Node),
 5123: 
 5124: 	    %% 
 5125: 	    %% Write manager config
 5126: 	    %% 
 5127: 
 5128: 	    ok = write_manager_config(Config),
 5129: 
 5130: 	    IRB  = case AutoInform of
 5131: 		       true ->
 5132: 			   auto;
 5133: 		       _ ->
 5134: 			   user
 5135: 		   end,
 5136: 	    Conf = [{manager_node, Node}, {manager_peer, Peer}, {irb, IRB} | Config],
 5137: 	    Vsns = [v1,v2,v3], 
 5138: 	    start_manager(Node, Vsns, Conf)
 5139: 	end
 5140:     catch
 5141: 	C:{suite_failed, Reason, _M, _L} = E:S when (C =:= exit) ->
 5142: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during manager start (suite-failed):"
 5143:                     "~n      Reason:      ~p"
 5144:                     "~n      StackTrace:  ~p", [Reason, S]), 
 5145: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5146: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5147: 	    erlang:raise(C, E, S);
 5148: 	C:E:S ->
 5149: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during manager start: "
 5150:                     "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 5151:                     "~n      Error:       ~p"
 5152:                     "~n      StackTrace:  ~p", [C, E, S]), 
 5153: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5154: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5155: 	    ?FAIL({failed_starting_manager, C, E, S})
 5156:     end.
 5157: 
 5158: init_v3_manager(Case, Config) ->
 5159: 
 5160:     ?IPRINT("init_v3_manager -> entry with"
 5161:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
 5162: 
 5163:     %% -- 
 5164:     %% Start node
 5165:     %% 
 5166: 
 5167:     {Peer, Node} = start_node(lists:concat([Case, "-v3mgr"])),
 5168: 
 5169:     %% The point with this (try catch block) is to be 
 5170:     %% able to do some cleanup in case we fail to 
 5171:     %% start some of the apps. That is, if we fail to 
 5172:     %% start the apps (mnesia, crypto and snmp agent) 
 5173:     %% we stop the (agent) node!
 5174: 
 5175:     try
 5176: 	begin
 5177: 
 5178: 	    %% -- 
 5179: 	    %% Start and initiate crypto on manager node
 5180: 	    %% 
 5181: 
 5182: 	    ok = init_crypto(Node),
 5183: 
 5184: 	    %% 
 5185: 	    %% Write manager config
 5186: 	    %% 
 5187: 
 5188:             %% DomainType is just a "dummy" arg to make the 
 5189:             %% function choose transportDomainUdpIpv4 as transport domain.
 5190: 	    ok = write_manager_config(transport, Config),
 5191: 
 5192: 	    IRB  = auto,
 5193: 	    Conf = [{manager_node, Node}, {manager_peer, Peer}, {irb, IRB} | Config],
 5194: 	    Vsns = [v3], 
 5195: 	    start_manager(Node, Vsns, Conf)
 5196: 	end
 5197:     catch
 5198: 	C:{suite_failed, Reason, _M, _L} = E:S when (C =:= exit) ->
 5199: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during manager start (suite-failed):"
 5200:                     "~n      Reason:      ~p"
 5201:                     "~n      StackTrace:  ~p", [Reason, S]), 
 5202: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5203: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5204: 	    erlang:raise(C, E, S);
 5205: 	C:E:S ->
 5206: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during manager start: "
 5207:                     "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 5208:                     "~n      Error:       ~p"
 5209:                     "~n      StackTrace:  ~p", [C, E, S]), 
 5210: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5211: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5212: 	    ?FAIL({failed_starting_manager, C, E, S})
 5213:     end.
 5214: 
 5215: fin_v3_manager(Config) ->
 5216:     fin_manager(Config).
 5217: 
 5218: fin_manager(Config) ->
 5219:     Node = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 5220:     StopMgrRes    = stop_manager(Node),
 5221:     StopCryptoRes = fin_crypto(Node),
 5222:     StopNode      = peer:stop(?config(manager_peer, Config)),
 5223:     ?IPRINT("fin_manager -> stop apps and (mgr node ~p) node results: "
 5224:             "~n      SNMP Mgr: ~p"
 5225:             "~n      Crypto:   ~p"
 5226:             "~n      Node:     ~p", 
 5227:             [Node, StopMgrRes, StopCryptoRes, StopNode]),
 5228:     Config.
 5229:     
 5230: 
 5231: %% -- Misc agent functions --
 5232: 
 5233: init_agent(Case, Config) ->
 5234:     ?IPRINT("init_agent -> entry with"
 5235:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
 5236: 
 5237:     %% -- 
 5238:     %% Retrieve some dir's
 5239:     %% 
 5240:     Dir    = ?config(agent_dir, Config),
 5241:     MibDir = ?config(mib_dir,  Config),
 5242: 
 5243:     %% -- 
 5244:     %% Start node
 5245:     %% 
 5246: 
 5247:     {Peer, Node} = start_node(lists:concat([Case, "-agent"])),
 5248: 
 5249:     %% The point with this (try catch block) is to be 
 5250:     %% able to do some cleanup in case we fail to 
 5251:     %% start some of the apps. That is, if we fail to 
 5252:     %% start the apps (mnesia, crypto and snmp agent) 
 5253:     %% we stop the (agent) node!
 5254: 
 5255:     try
 5256: 	begin
 5257: 
 5258: 	    %% -- 
 5259: 	    %% Start and initiate mnesia on agent node
 5260: 	    %% 
 5261: 
 5262: 	    ok = init_mnesia(Node, Dir, ?config(mnesia_debug, Config)),
 5263: 
 5264: 
 5265: 	    %% -- 
 5266: 	    %% Start and initiate crypto on agent node
 5267: 	    %% 
 5268: 
 5269: 	    ok = init_crypto(Node),
 5270: 
 5271: 
 5272: 	    %% 
 5273: 	    %% Write agent config
 5274: 	    %% 
 5275: 
 5276: 	    Vsns = [v1,v2], 
 5277: 	    ok = write_agent_config(Vsns, Config),
 5278: 
 5279: 	    Conf = [{agent_node, Node},  {agent_peer, Peer},
 5280: 		    {mib_dir,    MibDir} | Config],
 5281: 
 5282: 	    %% 
 5283: 	    %% Start the agent 
 5284: 	    %% 
 5285: 
 5286: 	    start_agent(Node, Vsns, Conf)
 5287: 	end
 5288:     catch
 5289: 	C:{suite_failed, Reason, _M, _L} = E:S when (C =:= exit) ->
 5290: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during agent start (suite-failed):"
 5291:                     "~n   Reason:     ~p"
 5292:                     "~n   StackTrace: ~p", [Reason, S]), 
 5293: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5294: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5295: 	    erlang:raise(C, E, S);
 5296: 	C:E:S ->
 5297: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during agent start: "
 5298:                     "~n   Error Class: ~p"
 5299:                     "~n   Error:       ~p"
 5300:                     "~n   StackTrace:  ~p", [C, E, S]), 
 5301: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5302: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5303: 	    ?FAIL({failed_starting_agent, C, E, S})
 5304:     end.
 5305:

 5307: init_v3_agent(Case, Config) ->
 5308:     ?IPRINT("init_v3_agent -> entry with"
 5309:             "~n   Config: ~p", [Config]),
 5310: 
 5311:     %% -- 
 5312:     %% Retrieve some dir's
 5313:     %% 
 5314:     _Dir    = ?config(agent_dir, Config),
 5315:     MibDir = ?config(mib_dir,  Config),
 5316: 
 5317:     %% -- 
 5318:     %% Start node
 5319:     %% 
 5320: 
 5321:     %% ?line Node = self(),
 5322:     ?line {Peer, Node} = start_node(lists:concat([Case, "-v3agent"])),
 5323: 
 5324:     %% The point with this (try catch block) is to be 
 5325:     %% able to do some cleanup in case we fail to 
 5326:     %% start some of the apps. That is, if we fail to 
 5327:     %% start the apps (mnesia, crypto and snmp agent) 
 5328:     %% we stop the (agent) node!
 5329: 
 5330:     try
 5331: 	begin
 5332: 
 5333: 	    %% -- 
 5334: 	    %% Start and initiate crypto on agent node
 5335: 	    %% 
 5336: 
 5337: 	    ok = init_crypto(Node),
 5338: 
 5339: 
 5340: 	    %% 
 5341: 	    %% Write agent config
 5342: 	    %% 
 5343: 
 5344: 	    Vsns = [v3], 
 5345: 	    ok = write_agent_config(Vsns, Config),
 5346: 
 5347: 	    Conf = [{agent_node, Node}, {agent_peer, Peer},
 5348: 		    {mib_dir,    MibDir} | Config],
 5349: 
 5350: 	    %% 
 5351: 	    %% Start the agent 
 5352: 	    %% 
 5353: 
 5354: 	    start_agent(Node, Vsns, Conf)
 5355: 	end
 5356:     catch
 5357: 	C:{suite_failed, Reason, _M, _L} = E:S when (C =:= exit) ->
 5358: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during agent start (suite-failed):"
 5359:                     "~n   Reason:     ~p"
 5360:                     "~n   StackTrace: ~p", [Reason, S]), 
 5361: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5362: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5363: 	    erlang:raise(C, E, S);
 5364: 	C:E:S ->
 5365: 	    ?EPRINT("Failure during agent start: "
 5366:                     "~n   Error Class: ~p"
 5367:                     "~n   Error:       ~p"
 5368:                     "~n   StackTrace:  ~p", [C, E, S]), 
 5369: 	    %% And now, *try* to cleanup
 5370: 	    (catch peer:stop(Peer)),
 5371: 	    ?FAIL({failed_starting_agent, C, E, S})

 5374: 
 5375: fin_agent(Config) ->
 5376:     Node          = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 5377:     StopAgentRes  = stop_agent(Node),
 5378:     StopCryptoRes = fin_crypto(Node),
 5379:     StopMnesiaRes = fin_mnesia(Node),
 5380:     StopNode      = peer:stop(?config(agent_peer, Config)),
 5381:     ?IPRINT("fin_agent -> stop apps and (agent node ~p) node results: "
 5382:             "~n   SNMP Agent: ~p"
 5383:             "~n   Crypto:     ~p"
 5384:             "~n   Mnesia:     ~p"
 5385:             "~n   Node:       ~p", 
 5386:             [Node, StopAgentRes, StopCryptoRes, StopMnesiaRes, StopNode]),
 5387:     Config.
 5388: 
 5389: fin_v3_agent(Config) ->
 5390:     Node          = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 5391:     StopAgentRes  = stop_agent(Node),
 5392:     StopCryptoRes = fin_crypto(Node),
 5393:     StopNode      = peer:stop(?config(agent_peer, Config)),
 5394:     ?IPRINT("fin_agent -> stop apps and (agent node ~p) node results: "
 5395:             "~n   SNMP Agent: ~p"
 5396:             "~n   Crypto:     ~p"
 5397:             "~n   Node:       ~p", 
 5398:             [Node, StopAgentRes, StopCryptoRes, StopNode]),
 5399:     Config.
 5400: 
 5401: init_mnesia(Node, Dir, MnesiaDebug) 
 5402:   when ((MnesiaDebug =/= none) andalso 
 5403: 	(MnesiaDebug =/= debug) andalso (MnesiaDebug =/= trace)) ->
 5404:     init_mnesia(Node, Dir, ?DEFAULT_MNESIA_DEBUG);
 5405: init_mnesia(Node, Dir, MnesiaDebug) ->
 5406:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> load application mnesia", []),
 5407:     ok = load_mnesia(Node),
 5408: 
 5409:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> application mnesia: set_env dir: ~n~p",[Dir]),
 5410:     ok = set_mnesia_env(Node, dir, filename:join(Dir, "mnesia")),
 5411: 
 5412:     %% Just in case, only set (known to be) valid values for debug
 5413:     if
 5414: 	((MnesiaDebug =:= debug) orelse (MnesiaDebug =:= trace)) ->
 5415: 	    ?DBG("init_mnesia -> application mnesia: set_env debug: ~w", 
 5416: 		 [MnesiaDebug]),
 5417: 	    ok = set_mnesia_env(Node, debug, MnesiaDebug);
 5418: 	true ->
 5419: 	    ok
 5420:     end,
 5421: 
 5422:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> create mnesia schema",[]),
 5423:     case create_schema(Node) of
 5424: 	      ok ->
 5425: 		  ok;
 5426: 	      {error, {Node, {already_exists, Node}}} ->
 5427: 		  ok = delete_schema(Node),
 5428: 		  ok = create_schema(Node);
 5429: 	      Error ->
 5430: 		  ?FAIL({failed_creating_mnesia_schema, Error})
 5431: 	  end,
 5432:     
 5433:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> start application mnesia",[]),
 5434:     ok = start_mnesia(Node),
 5435: 
 5436:     ?DBG("init_mnesia -> create tables",[]),
 5437:     ok = create_tables(Node),
 5438:     ok.
 5439: 
 5440: fin_mnesia(Node) ->
 5441:     ok = delete_tables(Node),
 5442:     ok = stop_mnesia(Node),
 5443:     ok.
 5444: 
 5445: 
 5446: init_crypto(Node) ->
 5447:     ok = load_crypto(Node),
 5448:     ok = start_crypto(Node),
 5449:     ok.
 5450: 
 5451: fin_crypto(Node) ->
 5452:     ok = stop_crypto(Node),
 5453:     ok.
 5454: 
 5455: 
 5456: %% -- Misc application wrapper functions --
 5457: 
 5458: load_app(Node, App) ->
 5459:     VerifySuccess = fun(ok) ->
 5460: 			    ok;
 5461: 		       ({error, {already_loaded, LoadedApp}}) when (LoadedApp =:= App) ->
 5462: 			    ok;
 5463: 		       ({error, Reason}) ->
 5464: 			    ?EPRINT("failed loading app ~w on ~p: "
 5465:                                     "~n      ~p", [App, Node, Reason]),
 5466: 			    ?FAIL({failed_load, Node, App, Reason})
 5467: 		    end,
 5468:     do_load_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess).
 5469: 
 5470: do_load_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) 
 5471:   when (Node =:= node()) andalso is_atom(App) ->
 5472:     %% Local app
 5473:     exec(fun() -> application:load(App) end, VerifySuccess);
 5474: do_load_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) ->
 5475:     %% Remote app
 5476:     exec(fun() -> rcall(Node, application, load, [App]) end, VerifySuccess).
 5477: 
 5478: 
 5479: start_app(Node, App) ->
 5480:     VerifySuccess = fun(ok) ->
 5481: 			    ok;
 5482: 		       ({error, {already_started, LoadedApp}}) when (LoadedApp =:= App) ->
 5483: 			    ok;
 5484: 		       ({error, Reason}) ->
 5485: 			    ?EPRINT("failed starting app ~w on ~p: "
 5486:                                     "~n   Reason: ~p", [App, Node, Reason]),
 5487: 			    ?FAIL({failed_start, Node, App, Reason})
 5488: 		    end,
 5489:     start_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess).
 5490: 
 5491: start_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) 
 5492:   when (Node =:= node()) andalso is_atom(App) ->
 5493:     exec(fun() -> application:start(App) end, VerifySuccess);
 5494: start_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) ->
 5495:     exec(fun() -> rcall(Node, application, start, [App]) end, VerifySuccess).
 5496: 
 5497: 
 5498: stop_app(Node, App) ->
 5499:     VerifySuccess = fun(ok) ->
 5500: 			    ok;
 5501: 		       ({error, {not_started, LoadedApp}}) when (LoadedApp =:= App) ->
 5502: 			    ok;
 5503: 		       ({error, Reason}) ->
 5504: 			    ?EPRINT("failed stopping app ~w on ~p: "
 5505:                                     "~n      ~p", [App, Node, Reason]),
 5506: 			    ?FAIL({failed_stop, Node, App, Reason})
 5507: 		    end,
 5508:     stop_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess).
 5509:     
 5510: stop_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) 
 5511:   when (Node =:= node()) andalso is_atom(App)  ->
 5512:     exec(fun() -> application:stop(App) end, VerifySuccess);
 5513: stop_app(Node, App, VerifySuccess) when is_atom(App) ->
 5514:     exec(fun() -> rcall(Node, application, stop, [App]) end, VerifySuccess).
 5515: 
 5516: 
 5517: set_app_env(Node, App, Key, Val) ->
 5518:     VerifySuccess = fun(ok) ->
 5519: 			    ok;
 5520: 		       ({error, Reason}) ->
 5521: 			    ?EPRINT("failed setting app ~w env on ~p"
 5522:                                     "~n      Key:    ~p"
 5523:                                     "~n      Val:    ~p"
 5524:                                     "~n      Reason: ~p",
 5525:                                     [App, Node, Key, Val, Reason]),
 5526: 			    ?FAIL({failed_set_app_env, 
 5527: 				   Node, App, Key, Val, Reason})
 5528: 		    end,
 5529:     set_app_env(Node, App, Key, Val, VerifySuccess).
 5530: 
 5531: set_app_env(Node, App, Key, Val, VerifySuccess) 
 5532:   when (Node =:= node()) andalso is_atom(App) ->
 5533:     exec(fun() -> application:set_env(App, Key, Val) end, VerifySuccess);
 5534: set_app_env(Node, App, Key, Val, VerifySuccess) when is_atom(App) ->
 5535:     exec(fun() -> rcall(Node, application, set_env, [App, Key, Val]) end, 
 5536: 	 VerifySuccess).
 5537: 
 5538: 
 5539: exec(Cmd, VerifySuccess) ->
 5540:     VerifySuccess(Cmd()).
 5541: 
 5542: 
 5543: %% -- Misc snmp wrapper functions --
 5544: 
 5545: load_snmp(Node)                 -> load_app(Node, snmp).
 5546: start_snmp(Node)                -> start_app(Node, snmp).
 5547: stop_snmp(Node)                 -> stop_app(Node, snmp).
 5548: set_agent_env(Node, Env)        -> set_snmp_env(Node, agent, Env).
 5549: set_mgr_env(Node, Env)          -> set_snmp_env(Node, manager, Env).
 5550: set_snmp_env(Node, Entity, Env) -> set_app_env(Node, snmp, Entity, Env).
 5551: 
 5552: mgr_info(Node) ->
 5553:     rcall(Node, snmpm, info, []).
 5554: 
 5555: mgr_sys_info(Node) ->
 5556:     rcall(Node, snmpm_config, system_info, []).
 5557: 
 5558: mgr_register_user(Node, Id, Mod, Data) when is_atom(Mod) ->
 5559:     rcall(Node, snmpm, register_user, [Id, Mod, Data]).
 5560: 
 5561: mgr_register_usm_user(Node, EngineID, SecName, Credentials)
 5562:   when (Node =:= node()) ->
 5563:     snmpm:register_usm_user(EngineID, SecName, Credentials);
 5564: mgr_register_usm_user(Node, EngineID, SecName, Credentials) ->
 5565:     rcall(Node, snmpm, register_usm_user, [EngineID, SecName, Credentials]).
 5566: 
 5567: mgr_unregister_user(Node, Id) ->
 5568:     rcall(Node, snmpm, unregister_user, [Id]).
 5569: 
 5570: mgr_which_users(Node) ->
 5571:     rcall(Node, snmpm, which_users, []).
 5572: 
 5573: mgr_register_agent(Node, Id, Port, Conf) 
 5574:   when is_integer(Port) andalso is_list(Conf) ->
 5575:     Localhost = snmp_test_lib:localhost(),
 5576:     mgr_register_agent(Node, Id, Localhost, Port, Conf);
 5577: mgr_register_agent(Node, Id, TargetName, Config) 
 5578:   when is_list(TargetName) andalso is_list(Config) ->
 5579:     rcall(Node, snmpm, register_agent, [Id, TargetName, Config]).
 5580: 
 5581: mgr_register_agent(Node, Id, Addr, Port, Conf) 
 5582:   when is_integer(Port) andalso is_list(Conf) ->
 5583:     rcall(Node, snmpm, register_agent, [Id, Addr, Port, Conf]).
 5584: 
 5585: mgr_unregister_agent(Node, Id, Port) when is_integer(Port) ->
 5586:     Localhost = snmp_test_lib:localhost(),
 5587:     rcall(Node, snmpm, unregister_agent, [Id, Localhost, Port]);
 5588: mgr_unregister_agent(Node, Id, TargetName) when is_list(TargetName) ->
 5589:     rcall(Node, snmpm, unregister_agent, [Id, TargetName]).
 5590: 
 5591: mgr_which_agents(Node) ->
 5592:     rcall(Node, snmpm, which_agents, []).
 5593: 
 5594: mgr_which_agents(Node, Id) ->
 5595:     rcall(Node, snmpm, which_agents, [Id]).

 5612: create_schema(Node) ->
 5613:     rcall(Node, mnesia, create_schema, [[Node]]).
 5614: 
 5615: delete_schema(Node) ->
 5616:     rcall(Node, mnesia, delete_schema, [[Node]]).
 5617: 
 5618: create_table(Node, Table) ->
 5619:     rcall(Node, mnesia, create_table, [Table]).
 5620: 
 5621: delete_table(Node, Table) ->
 5622:     rcall(Node, mnesia, delete_table, [Table]).
 5623: 
 5624: create_tables(Node) ->
 5625:     Tab1 = [{name,       friendsTable2},
 5626: 	    {ram_copies, [Node]},
 5627: 	    {snmp,       [{key, integer}]},
 5628: 	    {attributes, [a1,a2,a3]}],
 5629:     Tab2 = [{name,       kompissTable2},
 5630: 	    {ram_copies, [Node]},
 5631: 	    {snmp,       [{key, integer}]},
 5632: 	    {attributes, [a1,a2,a3]}],
 5633:     Tab3 = [{name,       snmp_variables},
 5634: 	    {attributes, [a1,a2]}],
 5635:     Tabs = [Tab1, Tab2, Tab3],
 5636:     create_tables(Node, Tabs).
 5637: 
 5638: create_tables(_Node, []) ->
 5639:     ok;
 5640: create_tables(Node, [Tab|Tabs]) ->
 5641:     case create_table(Node, Tab) of
 5642: 	{atomic, ok} ->
 5643: 	    create_tables(Node, Tabs);
 5644: 	Error ->
 5645: 	    ?FAIL({failed_creating_table, Node, Tab, Error})
 5646:     end.
 5647: 
 5648: delete_tables(Node) ->
 5649:     Tabs = [friendsTable2, kompissTable2, snmp_variables],
 5650:     delete_tables(Node, Tabs).
 5651: 
 5652: %% delete_mib_storage_tables(Node) ->
 5653: %%     Tabs = [snmpa_mib_data, snmpa_mib_tree, snmpa_symbolic_store],
 5654: %%     delete_tables(Node, Tabs).
 5655: 
 5656: delete_tables(Node, Tabs) ->
 5657:     lists:foreach(fun(Tab) -> delete_table(Node, Tab) end, Tabs).
 5658:

 5660: %% -- Misc manager user wrapper functions --
 5661: 
 5662: init_mgr_user(Conf) ->
 5663:     ?IPRINT("init_mgr_user -> entry with"
 5664:             "~n   Conf: ~p", [Conf]),
 5665: 
 5666:     Node   = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5667:     %% UserId = ?config(user_id, Conf),
 5668: 
 5669:     {ok, User} = mgr_user_start(Node),
 5670:     ?DBG("start_mgr_user -> User: ~p", [User]),
 5671:     link(User),
 5672:     
 5673:     [{user_pid, User} | Conf].
 5674: 
 5675: init_mgr_v3_user(Conf) ->
 5676:     ?IPRINT("init_mgr_v3_user -> entry with"
 5677:             "~n   Conf: ~p", [Conf]),
 5678: 
 5679:     Node   = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5680:     %% UserId = ?config(user_id, Conf),
 5681: 
 5682:     {ok, User} = mgr_user_start(Node),
 5683:     ?IPRINT("start_mgr_v3_user -> User: ~p", [User]),
 5684:     link(User),
 5685: 
 5686:     EngineID    = "agentEngine",
 5687:     AuthAlg     = ?config(auth_alg, Conf),
 5688:     SecName     = select_secname_from_authalg(AuthAlg),% "authSHA224",
 5689:     AuthKey     = select_authkey_from_authalg(AuthAlg),% "passwd_sha224xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx",
 5690:     Credentials =
 5691:       [ {auth,     select_auth_proto(AuthAlg)},
 5692:         {auth_key, AuthKey}
 5693:       ],
 5694:     ok = mgr_register_usm_user(Node, EngineID, SecName, Credentials),
 5695:     
 5696:     ?IPRINT("start_mgr_v3_user -> done"),
 5697:     [{user_pid, User} | Conf].
 5698: 
 5699: select_secname_from_authalg(md5) ->
 5700:     "authMD5";
 5701: select_secname_from_authalg(sha) ->
 5702:     "authSHA";
 5703: select_secname_from_authalg(sha224) ->
 5704:     "authSHA224";
 5705: select_secname_from_authalg(sha256) ->
 5706:     "authSHA256";
 5707: select_secname_from_authalg(sha384) ->
 5708:     "authSHA384";
 5709: select_secname_from_authalg(sha512) ->
 5710:     "authSHA512".
 5711: 
 5712: select_authkey_from_authalg(md5) ->
 5713:     "passwd_md5xxxxxx";
 5714: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha) ->
 5715:     "passwd_shaxxxxxxxxxx";
 5716: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha224) ->
 5717:     "passwd_sha224xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx";
 5718: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha256) ->
 5719:     "passwd_sha256xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx";
 5720: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha384) ->
 5721:     "passwd_sha384xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx";
 5722: select_authkey_from_authalg(sha512) ->
 5723:     "passwd_sha512xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx".
 5724: 
 5725: 
 5726: fin_mgr_user(Conf) ->
 5727:     User = ?config(user_pid, Conf),
 5728:     unlink(User),
 5729:     Node = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5730:     ok = mgr_user_stop(Node),
 5731:     Conf.
 5732: 
 5733: init_mgr_user_data1(Conf) ->
 5734:     Node = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5735:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Conf),
 5736:     IpFamily   = ?config(ipfamily, Conf),
 5737:     Ip         = ?config(ip, Conf),
 5738:     Port       = ?AGENT_PORT,
 5739:     ok =
 5740: 	case IpFamily of
 5741: 	    inet ->
 5742: 		mgr_user_register_agent(
 5743: 		  Node, TargetName,
 5744: 		  [{address,   Ip},
 5745: 		   {port,      Port},
 5746: 		   {engine_id, "agentEngine"}]);
 5747: 	    inet6 ->
 5748: 		mgr_user_register_agent(
 5749: 		  Node, TargetName,
 5750: 		  [{tdomain,   transportDomainUdpIpv6},
 5751: 		   {taddress,  {Ip, Port}},
 5752: 		   {engine_id, "agentEngine"}])
 5753: 	end,
 5754:     _Agents = mgr_user_which_own_agents(Node),
 5755:     ?DBG("Own agents: ~p", [_Agents]),
 5756: 
 5757:     {ok, _DefAgentConf} = mgr_user_agent_info(Node, TargetName, all),
 5758:     ?DBG("Default agent config: ~n~p", [_DefAgentConf]),
 5759: 
 5760:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5761: 					  community, "all-rights"),
 5762:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5763: 					  sec_name, "all-rights"),
 5764:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5765: 					  engine_id, "agentEngine"),
 5766:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5767: 					  max_message_size, 1024),
 5768: 
 5769:     {ok, _AgentConf} = mgr_user_agent_info(Node, TargetName, all),
 5770:     ?DBG("Updated agent config: ~n~p", [_AgentConf]),
 5771:     Conf.
 5772: 
 5773: init_mgr_user_data2(Conf) ->
 5774:     ?DBG("init_mgr_user_data2 -> entry with"
 5775: 	 "~n   Conf: ~p", [Conf]),
 5776:     Node       = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5777:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Conf),
 5778:     IpFamily   = ?config(ipfamily, Conf),
 5779:     Ip         = ?config(ip, Conf),
 5780:     Port       = ?AGENT_PORT,
 5781:     ok =
 5782: 	case IpFamily of
 5783: 	    inet ->
 5784: 		mgr_user_register_agent(
 5785: 		  Node, TargetName,
 5786: 		  [{address,   Ip},
 5787: 		   {port,      Port},
 5788: 		   {engine_id, "agentEngine"}]);
 5789: 	    inet6 ->
 5790: 		mgr_user_register_agent(
 5791: 		  Node, TargetName,
 5792: 		  [{tdomain,   transportDomainUdpIpv6},
 5793: 		   {taddress,  {Ip, Port}},
 5794: 		   {engine_id, "agentEngine"}])
 5795: 	end,
 5796:     _Agents = mgr_user_which_own_agents(Node),
 5797:     ?DBG("Own agents: ~p", [_Agents]),
 5798: 
 5799:     {ok, _DefAgentConf} = mgr_user_agent_info(Node, TargetName, all),
 5800:     ?DBG("Default agent config: ~n~p", [_DefAgentConf]),
 5801: 
 5802:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5803: 					  community, "all-rights"),
 5804:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5805: 					  sec_name, "all-rights"),
 5806:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5807: 					  max_message_size, 1024),
 5808: 
 5809:     {ok, _AgentConf} = mgr_user_agent_info(Node, TargetName, all),
 5810:     ?DBG("Updated agent config: ~n~p", [_AgentConf]),
 5811:     Conf.
 5812: 
 5813: init_mgr_v3_user_data(Conf) ->
 5814:     ?IPRINT("init_mgr_v3_user_data -> entry with"
 5815:             "~n   Conf: ~p", [Conf]),
 5816:     Node       = ?config(manager_node, Conf),
 5817:     TargetName = ?config(manager_agent_target_name, Conf),
 5818:     IpFamily   = ?config(ipfamily, Conf),
 5819:     Ip         = ?config(ip, Conf),
 5820:     Port       = ?AGENT_PORT,
 5821:     ok =
 5822: 	case IpFamily of
 5823: 	    inet ->
 5824: 		mgr_user_register_agent(
 5825: 		  Node, TargetName,
 5826: 		  [{tdomain,   transportDomainUdpIpv4},
 5827: 		   {taddress,  {Ip, Port}},
 5828: 		   {engine_id, "agentEngine"},
 5829:                    {version,   v3}]);
 5830: 	    inet6 ->
 5831: 		mgr_user_register_agent(
 5832: 		  Node, TargetName,
 5833: 		  [{tdomain,   transportDomainUdpIpv6},
 5834: 		   {taddress,  {Ip, Port}},
 5835: 		   {engine_id, "agentEngine"},
 5836:                    {version,   v3}])
 5837: 	end,
 5838:     _Agents = mgr_user_which_own_agents(Node),
 5839:     ?IPRINT("Own agents: ~p", [_Agents]),
 5840: 
 5841:     {ok, _DefAgentConf} = mgr_user_agent_info(Node, TargetName, all),
 5842:     ?IPRINT("Default agent config: ~n~p", [_DefAgentConf]),
 5843: 
 5844:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5845: 					  community, "all-rights"),
 5846:     SecName = select_secname_from_authalg(?config(auth_alg, Conf)),
 5847:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5848: 					  sec_name, SecName),
 5849:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5850: 					  sec_level, authNoPriv),
 5851:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5852: 					  sec_model, usm),
 5853:     ok = mgr_user_update_agent_info(Node, TargetName,
 5854: 					  max_message_size, 1024),
 5855: 
 5856:     {ok, _AgentConf} = mgr_user_agent_info(Node, TargetName, all),
 5857:     ?IPRINT("Updated agent config: ~n~p", [_AgentConf]),
 5858:     Conf.
 5859:

 5871:     mgr_user_which_own_agents(Node),
 5872:     Conf.

 5944: %% -- Misc manager wrapper functions --
 5945: 
 5946: start_manager(Node, Vsns, Config) ->
 5947:     start_manager(Node, Vsns, Config, []).
 5948: start_manager(Node, Vsns, Conf0, _Opts) ->
 5949: 
 5950:     ?IPRINT("start_manager -> entry with"
 5951:             "~n   Node:   ~p"
 5952:             "~n   Vsns:   ~p"
 5953:             "~n   Conf0:  ~p"
 5954:             "~n   Opts:   ~p", [Node, Vsns, Conf0, _Opts]),
 5955: 
 5956:     SCO     = ?config(socket_create_opts, Conf0),
 5957: 
 5958:     AtlDir  = ?config(manager_log_dir,    Conf0),
 5959:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir,   Conf0),
 5960:     DbDir   = ?config(manager_db_dir,     Conf0),
 5961:     IRB     = ?config(irb,                Conf0),
 5962: 
 5963:     ConfigVerbosity    = get_opt(manager_config_verbosity,     Conf0, trace),
 5964:     NoteStoreVerbosity = get_opt(manager_note_store_verbosity, Conf0, log),
 5965:     NetIfVerbosity     = get_opt(manager_net_if_verbosity,     Conf0, trace),
 5966: 
 5967:     AtlSeqNo           = get_opt(manager_atl_seqno,            Conf0, false),
 5968: 
 5969:     ServerVerbosity    = get_opt(manager_server_verbosity,     Conf0, trace),
 5970:     CBP                = get_opt(manager_server_cbproxy,       Conf0, temporary),
 5971:     NIS                = get_opt(manager_server_nis,           Conf0, none),
 5972: 
 5973:     NetIfConf = 
 5974: 	case get_opt(manager_net_if_module, Conf0, no_module) of
 5975: 	    no_module ->
 5976: 		[{verbosity, NetIfVerbosity},
 5977:                  {options,   SCO}];
 5978: 	    NetIfModule ->
 5979: 		[{module,    NetIfModule}, 
 5980: 		 {verbosity, NetIfVerbosity},
 5981:                  {options,   SCO}]
 5982: 	end,
 5983: 
 5984:     Env = [{versions,                 Vsns},
 5985: 	   {inform_request_behaviour, IRB},
 5986: 	   {audit_trail_log,          [{type,      read_write},
 5987:                                        {dir,       AtlDir},
 5988:                                        {size,      {10240, 10}},
 5989:                                        {repair,    true},
 5990:                                        {seqno,     AtlSeqNo}]},
 5991: 	   {config,                   [{dir,       ConfDir}, 
 5992:                                        {db_dir,    DbDir}, 
 5993:                                        {verbosity, ConfigVerbosity}]},
 5994: 	   {note_store,               [{verbosity, NoteStoreVerbosity}]},
 5995: 	   {server,                   [{verbosity, ServerVerbosity},
 5996:                                        {cbproxy,   CBP},
 5997:                                        {netif_sup, NIS}]},
 5998: 	   {net_if,                   NetIfConf}],
 5999:     ok = set_mgr_env(Node, Env),
 6000: 
 6001:     ok = try start_snmp(Node) of
 6002: 		   ok ->
 6003: 		       ok;
 6004: 		   {error, Reason} ->
 6005: 		       ?FAIL({failed_start_manager, Reason})
 6006: 	       catch
 6007: 		   exit:{suite_failed, {failed_start, _, _, Reason}, _M, _L}:_ ->
 6008: 		       ?FAIL({failed_start_manager, Reason});
 6009:                    C:E:S ->
 6010:                        erlang:raise(C, E, S)
 6011: 	       end,
 6012:     Conf0.
 6013: 
 6014: stop_manager(Node) ->
 6015:     stop_snmp(Node).
 6016: 
 6017: 
 6018: %% -- Misc agent wrapper functions --
 6019: 
 6020: start_agent(Node, Vsns, Config) ->
 6021:     start_agent(Node, Vsns, Config, []).
 6022: start_agent(Node, Vsns, Conf0, _Opts) ->
 6023:     ?DBG("start_agent -> entry with"
 6024: 	 "~n   Node:   ~p"
 6025: 	 "~n   Vsns:   ~p"
 6026: 	 "~n   Conf0:  ~p"
 6027: 	 "~n   Opts:   ~p", [Node, Vsns, Conf0, _Opts]),
 6028:     
 6029:     AtlDir  = ?config(agent_log_dir,  Conf0),
 6030:     ConfDir = ?config(agent_conf_dir, Conf0),
 6031:     DbDir   = ?config(agent_db_dir,   Conf0),
 6032: 
 6033:     MAV  = get_opt(agent_verbosity,                Conf0, trace),
 6034:     CV   = get_opt(agent_config_verbosity,         Conf0, info),
 6035:     LDBV = get_opt(agent_local_db_verbosity,       Conf0, info),
 6036:     MSV  = get_opt(agent_mib_server_verbosity,     Conf0, info),
 6037:     NSV  = get_opt(agent_note_store_verbosity,     Conf0, info),
 6038:     SSV  = get_opt(agent_symbolic_store_verbosity, Conf0, info),
 6039:     %% NIV  = get_opt(agent_net_if_verbosity,         Conf0, log),
 6040:     NIV  = get_opt(agent_net_if_verbosity,         Conf0, trace),
 6041: 
 6042:     Env = [{versions,        Vsns},
 6043: 	   {type,            master},
 6044: 	   {agent_verbosity, MAV},
 6045: 	   {audit_trail_log, [{type,   read_write},
 6046: 			      {dir,    AtlDir},
 6047: 			      {size,   {10240, 10}},
 6048: 			      {repair, true}]},
 6049: 	   {config,          [{dir,        ConfDir}, 
 6050: 			      {force_load, false}, 
 6051: 			      {verbosity,  CV}]},
 6052: 	   {db_dir,          DbDir},
 6053: 	   {local_db,        [{repair,    true},
 6054: 			      {auto_save, 10000},
 6055: 			      {verbosity, LDBV}]},
 6056: 	   {mib_server,      [{verbosity, MSV}]},
 6057: 	   {note_store,      [{verbosity, NSV}]},
 6058: 	   {stymbolic_store, [{verbosity, SSV}]},
 6059: 	   {net_if,          [{verbosity, NIV},
 6060:                               %% On some linux "they" add a 127.0.1.1 or something
 6061:                               %% similar, so if we don't specify bind_to
 6062:                               %% we don't know which address will be selected
 6063:                               %% (which will cause problems for some test cases).
 6064:                               {options, [{bind_to, true}]}]},
 6065: 	   {multi_threaded,  true}],
 6066:     ok = set_agent_env(Node, Env),
 6067: 
 6068:     try start_snmp(Node) of
 6069: 	      ok ->
 6070: 		  ok;
 6071: 	      {error, Reason} ->
 6072: 		  ?FAIL({failed_start_agent, Reason})
 6073: 	  catch
 6074: 	      exit:{suite_failed, {failed_start, _, _, Reason}, _M, _L}:_ ->
 6075: 		  ?FAIL({failed_start_agent, Reason});
 6076:               C:E:S ->
 6077: 		  erlang:raise(C, E, S)
 6078: 	  end,
 6079:     Conf0.
 6080: 
 6081: stop_agent(Node) ->
 6082:     stop_snmp(Node).
 6083: 
 6084: agent_load_mib(Node, Mib) ->
 6085:     rcall(Node, snmpa, load_mibs, [[Mib]]).
 6086: 
 6087: agent_send_trap(Node, Trap, Community, VBs) ->
 6088:     Args = [snmp_master_agent, Trap, Community, VBs],
 6089:     rcall(Node, snmpa, send_trap, Args).
 6090: 
 6091: agent_send_notif(Node, Trap, Name) ->
 6092:     agent_send_notif(Node, Trap, Name, []).
 6093: 
 6094: agent_send_notif(Node, Trap, Name, VBs) ->
 6095:     agent_send_notif(Node, Trap, no_receiver, Name, VBs).
 6096: 
 6097: agent_send_notif(Node, Trap, Recv, Name, VBs) ->
 6098:     Args = [snmp_master_agent, Trap, Recv, Name, VBs],
 6099:     rcall(Node, snmpa, send_notification, Args).
 6100: 
 6101: agent_info(Node) ->
 6102:     rcall(Node, snmpa, info, []).
 6103: 
 6104: 
 6105: %% -- Misc node operation wrapper functions --
 6106: 
 6107: start_node(Case) ->
 6108:     Args = ["-s", "snmp_test_sys_monitor", "start", "-s", "global", "sync"],
 6109:     Name = peer:random_name(lists:concat([?MODULE, "-", Case])),
 6110:     {ok, Peer, Node}  = ?CT_PEER(#{name => Name, args => Args}),
 6111:     global:sync(),
 6112:     {Peer, Node}.
 6113: 
 6114: %% -- Misc config wrapper functions --
 6115: 
 6116: write_manager_config(Config) ->
 6117:     write_manager_config(default, Config).
 6118: 
 6119: write_manager_config(DomainType, Config) ->
 6120:     Dir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Config),
 6121:     Ip  = tuple_to_list(?config(ip, Config)),
 6122:     %% Note that Addr and Port are actually only Addr and Port
 6123:     %% when DomainType is default.
 6124:     %% In all other cases the Addr is TransportDomain and 
 6125:     %% port is {Addr, Port}...
 6126:     {Addr, Port} =
 6127: 	case ?config(ipfamily, Config) of
 6128: 	    inet when (DomainType =:= default) ->
 6129: 		{Ip, ?MGR_PORT};
 6130: 	    inet ->
 6131: 		{transportDomainUdpIpv4, {Ip, ?MGR_PORT}};
 6132: 	    inet6 ->
 6133: 		{transportDomainUdpIpv6, {Ip, ?MGR_PORT}}
 6134: 	end,
 6135:     snmp_config:write_manager_snmp_files(
 6136:       Dir, Addr, Port, ?MGR_MMS, ?MGR_ENGINE_ID, [], [], []).
 6137: 
 6138: write_manager_conf(Dir) ->
 6139:     Port = "5000",
 6140:     MMS  = "484",
 6141:     EngineID = "\"mgrEngine\"",
 6142:     Str = lists:flatten(
 6143:             io_lib:format("%% Minimum manager config file\n"
 6144:                           "{port,             ~s}.\n"
 6145:                           "{max_message_size, ~s}.\n"
 6146:                           "{engine_id,        ~s}.\n",
 6147:                           [Port, MMS, EngineID])),
 6148:     write_manager_conf(Dir, Str).
 6149: 
 6150: write_manager_conf(Dir, Str) ->
 6151:     write_conf_file(Dir, "manager.conf", Str).
 6152: 
 6153: 
 6154: write_agent_config(Vsns, Conf) ->
 6155:     Dir = ?config(agent_conf_dir, Conf),
 6156:     Ip  = tuple_to_list(?config(ip, Conf)),
 6157:     Domain =
 6158: 	case ?config(ipfamily, Conf) of
 6159: 	    inet ->
 6160: 		transportDomainUdpIpv4;
 6161: 	    inet6 ->
 6162: 		transportDomainUdpIpv6
 6163: 	end,
 6164:     ok = write_agent_config_files(Dir, Vsns, Domain, Ip),
 6165:     ok = update_agent_usm(Vsns, Dir),
 6166:     ok = update_agent_community(Vsns, Dir),
 6167:     ok = update_agent_vacm(Vsns, Dir),
 6168:     ok = write_agent_target_addr_conf(Dir, Domain, Ip, Vsns),
 6169:     ok = write_agent_target_params_conf(Dir, Vsns),
 6170:     ok = write_agent_notify_conf(Dir),
 6171:     ok.
 6172:     
 6173: write_agent_config_files(Dir, Vsns, Domain, Ip) ->
 6174:     snmp_config:write_agent_snmp_files(
 6175:       Dir, Vsns, Domain, {Ip, ?MGR_PORT}, {Ip, ?AGENT_PORT}, "mgr-test",
 6176:       trap, none, "", ?AGENT_ENGINE_ID, ?AGENT_MMS).
 6177: 
 6178: update_agent_usm(Vsns, Dir) ->
 6179:     case lists:member(v3, Vsns) of

 6188:                      usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "",
 6189:                      "", ""}, 
 6190: 
 6191:                     {"agentEngine", "authMD5", "authMD5", zeroDotZero, 
 6192:                      usmHMACMD5AuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6193:                      usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "",
 6194:                      "passwd_md5xxxxxx", ""}, 
 6195: 
 6196:                     {"agentEngine", "authSHA", "authSHA", zeroDotZero, 
 6197:                      usmHMACSHAAuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6198:                      usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "", 
 6199:                      "passwd_shaxxxxxxxxxx", ""}, 
 6200: 
 6201: 		    {"agentEngine", "authSHA224", "authSHA224", zeroDotZero, 
 6202: 		     usmHMAC128SHA224AuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6203: 		     usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "", 
 6204: 		     "passwd_sha224xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx", ""}, 
 6205: 
 6206: 		    {"agentEngine", "authSHA256", "authSHA256", zeroDotZero, 
 6207: 		     usmHMAC192SHA256AuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6208: 		     usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "", 
 6209: 		     "passwd_sha256xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx", ""}, 
 6210: 
 6211: 		    {"agentEngine", "authSHA384", "authSHA384", zeroDotZero, 
 6212: 		     usmHMAC256SHA384AuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6213: 		     usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "", 
 6214: 		     "passwd_sha384xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx", ""}, 
 6215: 
 6216: 		    {"agentEngine", "authSHA512", "authSHA512", zeroDotZero, 
 6217: 		     usmHMAC384SHA512AuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6218: 		     usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "", 
 6219: 		     "passwd_sha512xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx", ""}, 
 6220: 
 6221:                     {"agentEngine", "privDES", "privDES", zeroDotZero, 
 6222:                      usmHMACSHAAuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6223:                      usmDESPrivProtocol, "", "", "", 
 6224:                      "passwd_shaxxxxxxxxxx", "passwd_desxxxxxx"}, 
 6225: 
 6226:                     {"mgrEngine", "all-rights", "all-rights", zeroDotZero, 
 6227:                      usmNoAuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6228:                      usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "",
 6229:                      "", ""}, 
 6230: 
 6231:                     {"mgrEngine", "no-rights", "no-rights", zeroDotZero, 
 6232:                      usmNoAuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6233:                      usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "",
 6234:                      "", ""},

 6237:                      usmHMACMD5AuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6238:                      usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "",
 6239:                      "passwd_md5xxxxxx", ""}, 
 6240:

 6242:                      usmHMACSHAAuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6243:                      usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "", 
 6244:                      "passwd_shaxxxxxxxxxx", ""}, 
 6245: 
 6246: 		    {"mgrEngine", "authSHA224", "authSHA224", zeroDotZero, 
 6247: 		     usmHMAC128SHA224AuthProtocol, "", "", 
 6248: 		     usmNoPrivProtocol, "", "", "", 
 6249: 		     "passwd_sha224xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx", ""}, 
 6250:

 6252: 		     usmHMAC192SHA256AuthProtocol, "", "",

 6274: 
 6275: update_agent_community([v3], _Dir) -> 
 6276:     ok;
 6277: update_agent_community(_, Dir) ->
 6278:     Conf = [{"no-rights", "no-rights", "no-rights", "", ""}],
 6279:     snmp_config:update_agent_community_config(Dir, Conf).
 6280: 
 6281: update_agent_vacm(_Vsns, Dir) ->
 6282:     Conf = [{vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authMD5",    "initial"}, 
 6283:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA",    "initial"}, 
 6284:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA224", "initial"}, 
 6285:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA256", "initial"}, 
 6286:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA384", "initial"}, 
 6287:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "authSHA512", "initial"}, 
 6288:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "privDES",    "initial"}, 
 6289:             {vacmSecurityToGroup, usm, "newUser",    "initial"},
 6290:             {vacmViewTreeFamily, "internet", ?tDescr_instance, 
 6291:              excluded, null}],
 6292:     snmp_config:update_agent_vacm_config(Dir, Conf).
 6293: 
 6294: write_agent_target_addr_conf(Dir, Domain, Ip, Vsns) ->
 6295:     snmp_config:write_agent_snmp_target_addr_conf(
 6296:       Dir, Domain, {Ip, ?MGR_PORT}, 300, 3, Vsns).
 6297: 
 6298: write_agent_target_params_conf(Dir, Vsns) -> 
 6299:     F = fun(v1) -> {"target_v1", v1,  v1,  "all-rights", noAuthNoPriv};
 6300:            (v2) -> {"target_v2", v2c, v2c, "all-rights", noAuthNoPriv};
 6301:            (v3) -> {"target_v3", v3,  usm, "all-rights", noAuthNoPriv}
 6302:         end,
 6303:     Conf = [F(Vsn) || Vsn <- Vsns],
 6304:     snmp_config:write_agent_target_params_config(Dir, "", Conf).
 6305: 
 6306: write_agent_notify_conf(Dir) -> 
 6307:     Conf = [{"standard trap",   "std_trap",   trap}, 
 6308:             {"standard inform", "std_inform", inform}],
 6309:     snmp_config:write_agent_notify_config(Dir, "", Conf).
 6310: 
 6311: 
 6312: write_conf_file(Dir, File, Str) ->
 6313:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, File), write),
 6314:     ok = io:format(Fd, "~s", [Str]),
 6315:     file:close(Fd).
 6316:  
 6317: 
 6318: %% ------
 6319: 
 6320: display_log(Config) ->
 6321:     case lists:keysearch(manager_log_dir, 1, Config) of
 6322: 	{value, {_, Dir}} ->
 6323: 	    case lists:keysearch(manager_node, 1, Config) of
 6324: 		{value, {_, Node}} ->
 6325: 		    LogDir  = Dir, 
 6326: 		    Mibs    = [], 
 6327: 		    OutFile = j(LogDir, "snmpm_log.txt"), 
 6328: 		    ?IPRINT("~n"
 6329:                             "========================="
 6330:                             "  < Audit Trail Log >  "
 6331:                             "========================="
 6332:                             "~n"),
 6333: 		    rcall(Node, snmpm, log_to_txt, [LogDir, Mibs, OutFile]),
 6334: 		    rcall(Node, snmpm, log_to_io, [LogDir, Mibs]),
 6335: 		    ?IPRINT("~n"
 6336:                             "========================="
 6337:                             " < / Audit Trail Log > "
 6338:                             "========================="
 6339:                             "~n");
 6340: 		false ->
 6341: 		    ?IPRINT("display_log -> no manager node found"),
 6342: 		    ok
 6343: 	    end;
 6344: 	false ->
 6345: 	    ?IPRINT("display_log -> no manager log dir found"),
 6346: 	    ok
 6347:     end.
 6348:

 6352: test2_mib(Config) ->
 6353:     j(test_mib_dir(Config), "Test2.bin").
 6354: 
 6355: test_trap_mib(Config) ->
 6356:     j(test_mib_dir(Config), "TestTrap.bin").
 6357: 
 6358: test_trap_v2_mib(Config) ->
 6359:     j(test_mib_dir(Config), "TestTrapv2.bin").
 6360: 
 6361: std_mib() ->
 6362:     j(mib_dir(), "STANDARD-MIB.bin").
 6363: 
 6364: snmpv2_mib() ->
 6365:     j(mib_dir(), "SNMPv2-MIB.bin").
 6366: 
 6367: test_mib_dir(Config) ->
 6368:     ?config(mib_dir, Config).
 6369: 
 6370: mib_dir() ->
 6371:     j(code:priv_dir(snmp), "mibs").
 6372: 
 6373: j(A, B) ->
 6374:     filename:join(A, B).
 6375:

 6377: %% ------
 6378: 
 6379: get_opt(Key, Opts, Def) ->
 6380:     snmp_misc:get_option(Key, Opts, Def).
 6381: 
 6382: 
 6383: %% ------
 6384: 
 6385: rcall(Node, Mod, Func, Args) when (Node =:= self()) ->
 6386:     apply(Mod, Func, Args);
 6387: rcall(Node, Mod, Func, Args) ->
 6388:     case rpc:call(Node, Mod, Func, Args) of
 6389: 	{badrpc, nodedown} ->
 6390: 	    ?FAIL({rpc_failure, Node});
 6391: 	Else ->
 6392: 	    Else
 6393:     end.
 6394: 
 6395: 
 6396: %% ------
 6397: 
 6398: ipv6_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6399:     [{ipfamily, inet6} | Config].
